工具（模具、检具、钳具，扳手等）的清单管理，并定期检查核对。

-按照作息时间上下班、用餐、休息。
-完成部门安排的其他事宜。

岗位职责:
To develop and manage a production scheduling process that is innovative and promotes maximization of efficiency and optimization of resources/assets internally while retaining enough flexibility to ensure that all customer needs are met in a timely and cost-conscious manner.  As well manage customer demands through regular communication & analysis, keep inventory at suitable level, ensure material on time delivery for whole value stream, manage ERP master data and Production order and purchase order date through cross-fuctions team work. 
发展和管理生产计划流程，通过促进效率最大化和资源/资产的内部优化，同时保持足够的灵活性，以确保所有客户的需求得到满足，及时和成本意识的方式。同时有效的管理客户的需求，通过定期的沟通和分析，使库存处于合适的水平，确保整个价值流的材料准时交货，通过跨功能团队的合作，有效的管理ERP主数据和生产订单和采购订单日期。

1. Develops production plan to accommodate customer demand within practical production capabilities and balances. Monitors the production plan and modifies as needed to maintain acceptable product availability and inventory levels. Provides and drives the improvement with related functions departments through related data collection and analysis. 
根据实际生产能力和平衡，制定生产计划以满足客户需求。监控生产计划并根据需要进行修改以保持可接受的产品可用性和库存水平。通过相关资料的收集和分析，提供和驱动与相关功能部门改进。
2. Develops demands management process and manage demands effectively through regular forecast acquisition from customer and good analysis on history data.
发展需求管理流程，通过定期采集客户预测和历史数据良好的分析，有效的管理需求。
3. Develops availability and inventory strategies that satisfy production needs & customer needs to ensure the inventory at the suitable level for finished goods and raw materials.
发展满足生产需求和客户需求的可用性和库存策略，以确保成品和原材料库存在合适的水平上。
4. Ensure EPR data accuracy of the related planning parameter, and date management for production planning & material planning through managing production order and purchasing order effectively.
确保相关ERP计划参数的准确性，有效的日期管理，确保有效的生产计划和物料计划。
5. Responsible for daily operation of return goods management for supplier and customer, and related billing & invoice process. 
负责供应商和客户退货管理的日常操作，以及相关的发货和发票流程。 
6. Develops material planning and ensure the material on time delivery to satisfy production needs, works with cross function to manage supplier. 
制定物料计划，确保物料准时交货以满足生产需要，有效与相关部门管理供应商。
7. Efficient communication with internal and external, and completes other assignments from supervisor.
与内部和外部的有效沟通，并完成主管分配其他任务。
任职资格:
1.Bachelor degree related to Logistics, Supply Chain or relevant is required.
本科学历，供应链相关专业。
2. Excellent interpersonal, teamwork, organization and communication skills, strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
优秀的人际关系、团队合作、组织和沟通能力，较强的分析和解决问题的能力。
3. Minimum 5-year experience of planning job, Good command of ERP system, SAP plus.                                                
5年以上计划工作经验，熟悉ERP系统，SAP优先。
4. Related APICS certificates, and 6 sigma experience are preferable.                                                                                 
有相关APICS证书，和6西格玛经验者优先。
5. A stable personality and high sense of responsibility, mature, self-motivated.       
个性稳重，责任心强，成熟，上进心强。

岗位职责:
1. To Analysis and review production capacity, manpower needed, abnormal production  situation.
    分析和评估生产产能，人力需求以及异常生产状况分析
2. To optimize the fixture and equipment, introduce automatic equipment and evaluate the result. 
    优化工装夹具以及设备，引进全自动设备，并且评估效果。
3. To be responsible of production line design and improvement by using IE method, continually optimize the process to improve efficiency, quality and reduce the cost. 
   通过使用IE方法负责生产线设计和提高， 持续优化工艺以提高效率、质量，并且降低成本。
4. To work with planner to make a reasonable cycle time for each project, to be responsible for cycle time control and modification. 与生产计划合作为每个项目制定合理的周期，并且负责周期控制和修改。
5. To keep good communication with other department, work with the whole team to push lean production system. 与各部门保持良好的沟通和合作，推进精益生产。
6. Other jobs assigned by dept. manager. 部门经理安排的其他工作。
任职资格:
Experience Required:
Have at least two years IE experience in electronics plant. 至少2年相关电子工厂IE工作经验。

Knowledge’s Skills And Abilities:
1. Be proficient in Pro-E & AutoCAD. 熟练使用Pro-E和AutoCAD
2. Skilled with IE method and tools.  掌握IE方法和工具
3. Excellent communication skills and conflict resolution skills. 良好的沟通和冲突解决能力
4. Highly organized and structured work behavior. 高度组织化和结构化的工作行为。
5. Good English, oral and written. 良好的英语沟通能力，包括书面和口语
6. Be familiar with ISO 9000 quality system 熟悉ISO9000质量管理体系

Education:
Above college in Industry Engineering or Automatic field. 
工业工程或自动化专业，大专及以上学历

岗位职责:
Environment, Health and Safety
	Adhere to all Sandvik EHS policies and procedures
	EHS thinking during design, process creation and so on.
1.	Production productivity improvement:
	 Measure and track the productivity improving based on the value design
	 Process improvement to reduce processing timing
	 Quick fixture set up to reduce exchange timing
	 Tools improvement to enhance productivity
	 Process sequence upgrade to reduce cycle time
	 Gauge upgrade to improve inspection timing
2.	Lean manufacturing:
	Found IE function system to upgrade and perfect standard work and efficiency management.
	Set up Standard time for all products and maintain, upgrade Stand time
	Follow up operations Key Performance Index, push improvement projects to improve the performance with Lean tools and 6 Sigma tools;
	Set up 5S and Visual management standard and push total Visual management projects;
	Organize VSM training and introduce drawing VSM, get results of Standard work direction;
	Material flow & process map & TP c/t ident
	Takt time clarification
	Workstation split
	Site organization system creation & set-up
	Material flow system design Kanban to reduce the WIP and shorten lead time;
	Indirect material usage analyses, introduce management system to reduce the manufacturing cost.
	Other improvement actions
3.	6 Sigma
	Training stuff to understand 6 Sigma thinking through 6 Sigma Improvement projects;
	Combine 6 Sigma and Lean projects make sure the Lean actions more efficiency.

了解LED灯具产品，有电子产品SMT、PCBA及组装相关经验者优先。

岗位职责:
职责：
1.模具及机械设计；
2.产品及配件等设计计算工作；
3.配合做好过程产品及成品质量监控；
4.配合做好工艺方案设计及实施；
5.负责技术资料的收集和整理工作。
任职资格:
要求：
1.大专以上文化，机电一体化或机械专业；
2.熟练使用CAD、UG、PROE等平面、三维软件；
3.工作细致、认真、善于思考问题，具备吃苦耐劳精神，有较强的动手能力；
4.具有良好的团队合作精神。

职位名称: SQE 供应商质量工程师
岗位职责:
1. Conduct annual supplier qualification/ random on site supplier process audit
实施年度供应商评审/随机过程审核
2. Conduct new supplier qualification and Supplier development负责新供应商评审和供应商持续改进；
3.Handle incoming daily issues & ensure incoming parts and components meet specifications & requirements 处理日常来料问题，确保外购件符合规范
4. Work with Buyer for TFC and CR review for supplier change, be responsible for PPAP review and approval, include necessary PPAP trial run. 	参与供应商变更引起的TFC和合同评审；相关的PPAP文件审核和批准，并包括必要的现场生产件批准程序。
5.Contribution to production/pre-production trail runs for both serial life and development components.
供应商的试生产及生产的现场审核
6. Be responsible for raw material NCM analysis, push supplier improve through NCM management tooling & 8D tooling, follow and close NCM. 负责量产原材料不良的分析，并推动供应商改进，运用NCM管理工具和8D分析工具，跟踪并负责供应商不符合报告的关闭;
7.Develop Inspection Instructions, Checklist, Procedures and etc to facilitate inspection activities
编制检验指导书、检验清单、程序等保证检验的有效进行
8.Resolve material quality with supplier & follow-up with Corrective Action
解决外购件质量问题、跟踪行动计划
9.Deal with supplier scrap and the associated documentation
处理供应商报废及相关文件
10.Monitor major suppliers performance & drive for continuous improvement, finish the output on schedule
监测供应商绩效，推动持续改进，按照节点完成数据输出
11.Train inspectors in handling, inspecting and testing of newly approved parts
培训检验员处理、检验和测量新批准的零件
12.Other tasks assigned by the immediate supervisor or manager.
完成由主管或经理安排的其它工作。

简历请投递：cnhr@flexitech.com
任职资格:
1.5 years’ experience in components quality management of supplier; 5年以上质量工作经验；
2.Bachelor degree in Mechanical Engineering or Auto Engineering机械工程或汽车工程本科以上学历
3. Familiar with TS16949 system and process audit (eg. VDA6.3),has internal auditor certificate;熟悉TS16949质量体系和过程审核(VDA6.3),有内审员证书或者QSB/VDA证书为佳
4.Ability to work under pressure and high availability for the ramp-up
能够在压力和紧张的环境下工作
5. Good negotiation and communication skills;有量产后供应商的管理经验，并熟悉入库检验的相关工作，流程和管理方法
6. Good spoken and written English;英语良好；
7. Similar to Quality Manual & Automotive 8D analysis tooling, such as fishbone and 8D熟悉质量工具五大手册以及汽车行业的主要的问题分析工具，诸如鱼骨图和8D
8. Good teamwork and cooperation有良好的团队合作精神和协调能力

岗位职责:
Job Responsibility: 
•.Assist quality activities utilizing engineering background.
•Identify required, gather and analyze data using 
•Support and manage issues through disciplined problem solving
•Engage in advanced/complex problem solving using Six Sigma methods/tools
•Apply Advanced Product Quality Planning (APQP) process and tools to new products and processes
•Learn certification requirements and participate in audits
•Apply quality risk assessment tools such as FMEAs and identify improved controls and poke-yokes
•Interact with suppliers and customers as necessary to drive quality improvements
•Assist in the design and improvement of manufacturing/production methods and control systems using new, existing, or modified machinery and equipment.  Design tools and equipment as necessary.
•Assist with Kaizen events by establishing course of action to accomplish task and/or project.
•Regular contact with others outside the work group.
•Introduce or recommend changes to work methods, safety measures, and labor organization.
•Develop methods for controlling production costs and costs analysis.
•Utilize knowledge and background to address Ergonomics/safety issues.
•Know basic manufacturing operations and lean practices.

;
任职资格:
Qualifications:
1.College or above, majoring in Quality Engineering, Quality Engineering Technology, or Manufacturing Engineering and Technology program
2.Have working knowledge of quality assurance methods and demonstrated application .Relevant experience gained through internship or co-op opportunities. Fresh graduate will also be accepted
3.Has knowledge of ISO/TS 16949 5 tools, familiar with PPAP, FMEA, APQP
4.Excellent verbal and written communication; project management experience is preferred.
5.Fluent in English and computer skills

岗位职责:
1、参与质量分析、编制质量控制计划，设计质量控制卡,确定质量控制点；
2、确定控制程序和必要的工装，确保过程质量和最终检验的控制；
3、协调相关部门对质量问题进行分析，并监督改善措施的执行情况和效果；
4、持续监控所有质量目标的进展，履行必要的改进措施；
5、负责产品相关质量文件和记录的维护和控制。

简历请投递：cnhr@flexitech.com
任职资格:
1、相关行业大专以上学历；
2、3年以上汽车零部件工厂质量相关岗位工作经验，
3、熟悉ISO9000质量管理体系；了解IATF 16949质量体系在企业的运作方法；了解产品工艺流程；熟悉运用质量管理工具及方法，如6sigma等；熟练使用办公软件；
4、工作认真负责，严谨细致，有较强的分析解决问题能力；良好的团队协作精神； 
5.日常的英语沟通能力。

5、客服管理

职位分类: 质量管理/测试经理(QA/QC经理)
岗位职责:
1、负责公司质量管理系统建立、维护和改进，如人员考核调配等工作；
2、组织、推动质量管理体系推行、实施与持续改进，包括负责第二、三方的审核或认证相关的策划、计划、组织等工作；
3、负责组织产品开发、生产中的异常问题的分析、改进活动；
4、负责对检验标准的制定、修改、定期评审，检查标准执行状况、有效性；
5、参与、策划各种质量管理活动，如参与对外协合作方的审核、认证工作和内部人员的质量培训。
任职资格:
1、管理、质量等相关行业专科以上学历；英语良好；
2、5年以上凹版印刷质量管理工作经验；
3、熟悉ISO9000质量管理体系；了解ISO9000质量体系在企业的运作方法；了解印刷产品工艺流程；熟悉运用质量管理工具及方法，如6sigma等；
4、工作认真负责，严谨细致，有较强的分析解决问题能力；

岗位职责:
1、机械工程或相关专业大专以上学历，年龄30岁以上。
2、受过生产作业管理、产品知识等方面的培训。
3、5年以上机械行业工艺流程、生产计划协调、跟踪管控等相关工作经验。
4、熟悉所在产业、行业的生产过程；熟悉主进度设计及图表；熟练使用办公软件。
5、具有敬业精神和拼搏精神，较好的团队合作精神；
6、良好的沟通能力、协调能力，能够承受高强度的工作压力。
   有电缆机械制造行业经验者优先。
   勿在人才网自动发送简历。

Job Responsibility:
1.In charge of booking hotel for guests, renting car for pick-up service.
2.Responsible for posting company announcements and filing, monthly organization chart updating.
3.Assist HR regular payment application signature (monthly – flight ticket agency, meal provider, shuttle bus, car rental, pure water etc; monthly-department expense).
4.In charge of setting up and maintaining vender information.
5.In charge of meeting room management, including assets keeping and food ordering.
6.In charge of updating Admin documentation, such as book records, key records, commercial insurance declaration records.
7.Responsible for employee card making, attendance card setting and management
8.Assist collect and summarize all the departments' monthly training records and training evaluation & feedback tracking.
9.In charge of monthly dept. attendance records.
10.Responsible for new employee on board and exit procedures, including material collecting, orientation arrangement and exit check list.
11.To cooperate with Administration Officer and to accomplish the job on time required by direct supervisor.
任职资格:
Qualifications:
1.College degree or Bachelor degree in HR, business, or related field.
2.Be patient to work independently, carefully and proactively.
3.Good communication skills with friendly personality.
4.Fluent English (speaking, listening, reading and writing) is a MUST 
5.Good command of MS Office (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint) is a MUST.

岗位职责:
1.厂车，食堂、基础设施，安全卫生得管理
2.办公及劳保用品的管理
3.其他公司交办事项
任职资格:
1.熟悉办公软件操作
2.为人诚实，积极上进，学习和沟通能力强

岗位职责: 营业担当，日语一级，语言表达能力强，性格开朗。负责日本客户的沟通与工作协调，对内技术资料的翻译与对应。5S管理的推进与监督，其他相关工作的跟进与实施。
任职资格: 日语一级，语言表达能力强，性格开朗。日文电脑熟练掌握使用

岗位职责:
1、做好产品的过程质量控制和终检工作。
2、严格把关外购外协精加工件，材料等的到厂检验。
3、严格按照图纸、工艺要求监督生产过程并纠正生产中的差错，减少返工做好记录。
4、经常巡回车间，及时了解生产过程中出现的技术或工艺问题，汇集相关技术和工艺人员商讨解决方案。
5、检验后，严格按照客户要求根据检验结果编制《产品检验报告》以及合格证，并按照合同交货日期提前做好发货准备。
6、负责对不合格品实施纠正和管理，有权采取纠正、返工等手段控制质量。

1.负责质量问题的沟通、协调、处理及跟着审核

2.负责供方业绩评估及改进

6.其他供方接口事项

2熟悉汽车行业五大手册，过程审核、产品审核、QC工具等

职位分类: 质量管理/测试主管(QA/QC主管)
岗位职责:
职责1: 确保质量保证系统符合现行的GMP的要求。
*	积极参与GMP自检和年度产品质量审核，及时起草年度质量报告。
*	负责审核成品的质量测试结果，生产批次记录；确保所有成品生产批次记录都得到审核。
*	负责更改控制的跟进和文件管理，所有的更改控制都得到有效管理。
*	负责产品的有效期研究，协调稳定性研究；确保产品的稳定性得到有效管理，所有稳定性数据得到评估，所有产品有效期得到确认。。
*	负责偏差调查的跟进，以及纠正、预防措施的实施和文件管理；确保所有偏差得到评估和管理，关键偏差得到QA的调查。
*	负责对退货进行检查和原因调查，提出处理方案；确保所有退货都得到评估和处理。
*	负责中控和环境监测的管理，结果的评价和生产过程的检查和取样，确保所有中控和环境监测结果都得到及时评价。

职责2:  确保每一位公司员工得到相关的GMP基础知识培训；确保客户和官方审计顺利进行。确保QA技术员的工作和行为规范符合公司以及GMP的要求
*	负责按“年度培训计划”按时完成对全公司员工提供的有关GMP基础知识的培训。
*	积极协助上司，做好客户质量审计的接待工作，提供必要地介绍和解释。在质量部经理授权下负责提供客户需要的资料和数据，做好客户服务工作，满足客户要求。确保所有客户及官方审计顺利通过。
*	负责管理和监督下属成员的工作任务，使其符合GMP的要求；确保所有下属成员清楚其职责和GMP要求。

职责3: 确保本部门的HSE、5S等各项工作符合公司要求
*	每周召开班组会议，强调安全行为规范；
*	定期检查所属区域的安全和5S情况
*	加强对下属员工的安全教育
*	保证管辖团队和区域内TF1=TF2=0， 5S检查结果良好

职责4: 确保完成上级安排的工作以及被授权的替代职能。

职责5：自觉并督促下属严格遵守公司各项规章制度、SOP和HSE制度；负责安排各下属成员的任务，并确保团队成员的岗位技能符合要求。
任职资格:
1.制药专业或其它相关专业(如微生物，化学工程等)大专或更高学历
2.在医药企业4年以上质量管理工作经验，有人员管理经验。
3.良好的协调、沟通和训练技巧
4.持续学习的能力
5.良好的管理技巧
6.良好的团队精神
7.熟练的英语书写，阅读能力及一定的口语能力。
8.能够使用Microsoft Office, Windows等
9.工作主动积极，责任感强

岗位职责:
1. 熟悉相关EHS的法律法规、国家标准；进行日常的健康、安全、环境维护工作。

2. 负责监督公司的安全设施和特种设备（压力容器、电梯、叉车、起重设备等）的检查、检测及管理工；负责组织员工进行特种设备的新训及年审工作。

3. 深入生产现场及时发现并排除各类安全风险隐患、避免酿成事故。

4. 负责公司OHSAS18000体系及安全标准化体系的有效运行与实施，负责内外部各相关部门审核合格。

5.  负责公司员工的工伤申报及处理工作，如发生重伤安全事故需按国家规定及时报告给公司负责人。

6. 负责公司员工的健康体检、职业病体检工作。

7.  完成部门领导交待的其它安全、消防、健康等方面的事务性工作。

8. 完成部门领导交待的其它辅助性工作。
任职资格:
1. 大专及以上学历;理工科专业优先
2. 熟悉安全相关法规及标准，掌握安全生产管理相关知识
3. 具有安全管理员上岗证
4. 英语熟练，有德语基础者优先
5. 具有两年以上机械行业或危化类企业安全管理经验

职位名称: Site Installation Engineer 现场安装工程师
职位分类: 售前/售后技术支持工程师
岗位职责:
Welcome to Buhlergroup Career Page 请访问瑞士布勒集团工作机会网页:
http://www.buhlergroup.com/global/en/about-buehler/career/jobs-worldwide.htm#.Vl5i3c-qqko

请候选人通过布勒公司官方应聘渠道投递您的简历：
http://live.solique.ch/microsites/buehler/microsite/?showPublication=9156c2aa-2202-4ee1-ad74-8e78b9c5d303

- Organizing site-logistic for Buhler-supplied equipment 组织安排公司设备的安装物流工作
- Preparing for start of site-installation做好安装调试前的准备工作
- Supervising site-safety of installation workers and equipment 监督管控现场, 确保人员及设备的安全
- Controlling site-installation quality, time and progress监控现场安装质量, 安装时间和进度
- Claim/Cost/Change Management 现场损控, 成本管理及变更管理
- Documentation and reporting 文件及报告类工作
- Communication & coordination between/among Buhler, customer and subcontractor 布勒、客户及第三承包方之间的沟通和协调
任职资格:
- Colleague degree or above, major in Mechanical Engineering or Grain Process 大专以上学历，机械工程或粮食加工专业
- Experience in the flour, rice, feed or oil plant 具备面粉或大米或饲料或油脂工厂的工作经验
- More than 3 year equipment erection or maintenance experience in grain processing or chemical engineering industry is preferred 有三年以上粮食加工或化工行业的设备安装、维护保养经验者优先
- Good English skills both in oral and written 良好的英语口语和书面交流能力
- Familiar with AutoCAD, 3D, Excel, word and Power point 熟悉CAD/MS Office 办公软件的基本操作
- Familiar with engineering flow sheets/diagrams, all kinds of drawings 熟悉工程工艺, 阅读各类工程施工图纸
- Familiar with assembling the equipment and piping connecting 熟悉设备装配和管道连接
- Must be self-motivated and be able to motivate team members 自我激励与激励团队成员
- Team-oriented, process-oriented, open, flexible, independent 良好的团队合作, 过程导向精神, 开朗, 灵活的处理问题, 能独立开展工作
- Willing to travel 愿意出差

职位分类: 售前/售后技术支持工程师

职位分类: 其他[客服及技术支持类]
岗位职责:
1. 公司电话接听，并转达相关责任人员；                                  
2. 客户询价处理，制作配件报价单，确认交货期；

7. 配件销售发票处理；
8. 客户投诉处理，收货短缺情况投诉处理以及产品品质问题投诉处理，与相关部门协调处理结果；
9. 客户回款情况跟进；
10. 客户回款情况跟进；
11. 主管安排的其他任务；
出口操作，CPM/BV与Sanyo订单；
1.制作与准备所有出口所需要的单证；
2.与货代联系租船订舱，与生产部、仓库、货代沟通协调出货与进货； 
3.及时将船运资料发于客户以及处理运输过程中出现的问题；
4.日常整理所有的进出口文本资料，及时归档；
5.月度整理总结报告；
任职资格: 有责任心，对工作认真，仔细，对客户耐心，抗压能力强；机械相关专业优先，英语要求四级以上；

岗位职责:
1.Develop and provide short and long term financial strategies designed to maximize the growth and profitability of Company.
2.Manage and coordinate all accounting procedures and provide leadership and coordination in business planning, accounting and budgeting efforts of the company.
3.Accurate and timely submit all financial monthly management reporting packages and other management reports in accordance with company, China government and Headquarter reporting deadlines.
4.Support in setting up the business by providing meaningful financial and commercial information that helps to shape business decisions and growth.
5.Preparation and monitoring of annual budgets, monthly management forecasts and quarterly forecast.
6.Contributes to the achievement of the company objectives by providing advice and guidance on financial strategy.

10.Leading the set up and the development of product costs and providing financial analysis support to cost accountant.
11.Contact external auditors, tax officials, and government officials.
12.Manage, train and supervise employees of this dept. to ensure the flawless functioning.

5、负责收集市场和行业信息,加深了解。

2、具备较强的客户沟通能力和较高的商务处理能力，具有良好的团队协作精神。

岗位职责:
1、负责客户的访问和审核；
2、提供客户技术和管理上的支持；
3、与所有内外部部门协调以解决有关客户需求和预期的问题；
4、处理或协调处理所有有关客户咨询/报价/项目方面的需求；处理客诉、付款等所有与客户相关的问题；建立维持与所有客户的良好关系；
5、通过提高总体客户满意度和业务提升，改善公司形象和服务质量。
6、 负责与顾客间的信息交流。
任职资格:
1、大专及以上学历；
2、1~3年制造业或业务的相关经验；
3、良好的人际关系及沟通技巧；
4、具有高度的责任心，富有创造性并自觉的乐于接受新的挑战；
5、英语口语良好；
6、愿意出差和接受工作分配。

岗位职责:
1.应收开票流程审核原始凭证的合法性、合理性和真实性，手续是否符合公司规定。
2.负责日常税务事宜(增值税/营业税/印花税的申报)
3.客户合同审查及存档
4.价格及信用的审核
5.应收账龄周分析及催款，总账和明细调节
6.应收凭证及部分现金银行凭证及报销凭证的录入
7.负责年度税务结算的准备
8.协助完成月底关帐
9.凭证整理及存档
10.完成财务总监安排的其他事宜
任职资格:
1.至少三年以上外资企业财务工作经验
2.熟悉相关财会，税务知识及政策法规
3.具备良好的英语听说读写能力
4.熟练使用办公软件及财务软件
5.需有会计上岗证

2.熟悉现场施工流程；

4.熟练使用相关安装\调试工具及设备检测工具；
5.遵守安全条例，做好工作时会产生危害的预防措施；
6.遵守公司及WHD的行为准则，不断提高自身技能；
7.能够向用户详细培训说明产品结构，功能及产品优势；
8.能够正确、有效、系统化的向客户推广公司的检修理念并结合客户的检修想法形成针对性的检修方案协助其他部门开拓检修市场；
9.完成经理及主管指派的其他任务。

2. 3年以上的相关工作经验；
3. 理解产品结构及性能；
4. 在相关外资企业的工作经验；
5. 良好的行为（积极主动，好学，执行力强）；
备注：1.优先考虑有送变电类安装公司或电气类公司的售后服务人员。
      2.优先考虑有隔离开关或变电站一次类设备的按照调试人员。

岗位职责:
工作职责：
备用金的审核及支付及费用账务等。
工作待遇：
薪资面议，8小时双休，有厂车，提供工作餐，有带薪年休假。按国家规定缴纳社保及公积金。
任职资格:
1、有出纳工作经验一年以上。
2、熟练使用Office办公软件，熟悉用友或类似的财务ERP系统，持会计证。
3、会计学中专及以上学历
4、工作勤奋、踏实、细心，责任感强

1.能独立组织编写质量体系文件，质量管理制度和规定,熟悉ISO9001,ISO14001,TS16949和QC080000体系,推动质量环境体系在公司各部门的落实；
2.熟悉来料、现场和成品的质量检验管理，对产品的符合性负责，汇总质量周、月报，对部门人员进行严格有效的管理 ；
3.有在机械行业的品质管理经验,熟悉冲压、注塑产品生产工艺流程和检验流程；
4.有较强的执行力及沟通与协调能力，有内审员资格者为佳，本科学历优先。

岗位职责:
1.整理、统计、分析各种财务数据，制定全面的成本预算，并向管理层提供成本信息和改进意见
2.抽查、监督、分析生产部门、仓库的存货盘点工作，对发生的盘盈、盘亏以及过时变质、毁损等需要报废的材料，要认真查明原因，分别情况及时按规定的程序报批处理
3.负责标准成本的设立、维护以及后续标准成本的回顾，提供产品成本差异分析
4.负责完成公司月底滚动预测，协助完成年度预算以及公司内部管理层相应分析报告
5.负责完成公司内部成本分析报告，边际贡献率分析、各成本项分析、盈亏平衡分析等
6.计算存货跌价准备及成本差异分析，检查SAP成本月结
7.协助完成新产品成本评估，完成各类公司投资类项目分析评估
8.培训下级成本核算会计及完成相关人员的工作绩效考核

岗位职责:
1.根据公司整体业务发展战略，负责开拓新的销售渠道及新客户，把握市场价格，控制产品成本，不断扩大产品市场占有率； 
2.定期收集市场需求及竞争对手信息，提出切实可行的市场分析及预测报告、销售开发方案和行动计划，收集营销信息和用户意见，对公司营销策略、售后服务等提出参考意见；
3.与客户保持良好沟通，实时把握客户需求，定期拜访现有客户和潜在目标客户，为客户提供主动、热情、满意、周到的服务； 
4.根据公司产品、价格及市场策略，处理询价、报价、合同条款协商及合同签订等事宜，负责客户货款的及时回笼并及时协调解决客户投诉，完成公司安排的其他任务。
任职资格:
1.机械类或市场营销、工商管理专业大专以上学历，28周岁以上，三年以上冲压、注塑、压铸产品销售业务或相关岗位经验，熟悉冲压、注塑、压铸工艺和冲压/注塑/压铸模具制造，掌握产品性能、应用领域、行业及竞争对手情况，熟练操作OFFICE软件；
2.具备敏锐的市场洞察力，充分掌握市场动态，有独立开展市场调研分析和开发市场的能力，不断发掘并维护好客户，沟通能力强，表达流利，谈吐沉稳，善于与客户、公司各部门之间沟通协调；
3.拥有优秀的个人品德和忠诚度，良好的亲和力和团队合作精神，事业心强，吃苦耐劳，能适应出差，有驾照、英语或日语熟练者更佳。

岗位职责:
1.主要负责本公司产品国内外市场的开发与销售；

4.协助上级领导制定月度、季度销售目标并分解到客户

7.客户的管理与维护：新客户的开发，通过多种渠道开拓市场，老客户的维护，建立良好的互动关系；
负责跟踪客户需求，需要出差，其实反馈客户的需要，还要与客户建立起良好的沟通让客户认同本公司的意见，需要出差。根据业绩有奖金.

岗位职责:
Position Summary:
Provide customer service to assigned customers, including pre-sales, sales tracking and after-sales services, to achieve targeted satisfied customer service.
Scope/Supervision and Interaction:
Reports to Customer Service Supervisor, with interaction with various departments including: Sales, planning, warehouse, Imp &Exp., pricing, and other functional department to offer premier customer service to customers.
Job Responsibility: 
1.Answer customer’s enquiries on product (referring catalogues), pricing, delivery status and other business related points, to quick and accurate response customer inquiries.
2. Quote properly and timely against quote rules, to provide premier pre-sales service.
3. Confirm sales contract, customer PO or E-order according to customer demand and Parker’s quotation, and provide filing for quotations, contracts, etc.
4. Review open SO timely and coordinate related functional teams for on-time delivery, to fulfill the signed contracts request.
5. Record customer claims within 24 hrs and respond timely by internal check, so the targets are meet.
6. Provide promise date report of open sales orders to major customers weekly. Prepare monthly report or other reports requested, to achieve a continuous improvement. 
7. Item creation and maintain to ensure updated and accurate raw data.  
8. Conduct customer visits for better mutual understanding and cooperation
任职资格:
Qualifications: 
1. College degree or above, major in business, machinery technical, administration etc., Engineering background will be a plus
2. Possess customer service concept, good communication skill, well-organized, careful, studious, sense of responsibility & team work, urgency and ownership
3. Possess product knowledge
4. Proficient in English and computer literate 
5. More than 3 years working experience, minimum 1 year on sales support or customer service.

岗位职责:
Justification for This Position:
To keep own quality personnel at Valmet. Practical work at suppliers’ site, not in the office.

Job Description (Main responsibilities):
1. Create quality control plan for purchasing projects
Continuous on-site inspections, provide process inspection reports and final reports
Make final decisions and work out regarding documents in quality database
Figure out solution to quality problems with suppliers
Handle quality claims, make corrective action plan with suppliers and follow up
2. Check and approve suppliers’ quality documents, e.g., certificate of raw material, dimension report, NDT report, painting report
3. Monitor marking, packaging of projects
4. Supervise project progress and delivery
5. Make explanation to suppliers according to Valmet’s requirements and drawings
6. Communicate with internal customers and clarify unclear specification to suppliers
 
Other Information, comments, etc.:
Must be ready to travel and stay at suppliers workshop continuously when it\'s needed. This person will be \"ear” marked to P&E projects. In case of no P&E projects then he / she will work based on needs from PAP or SER.
任职资格:
Competence Profile (Experience, knowledge, skills and capabilities essential to this position):
1. Several years experience of inspections for welding / machining / casting parts
2. Familiar with different kind of inspection tools. eg. micrometers, dial indicators. 
3. Ready to do independent work at suppliers workshop.
4. Strong person towards the supplier when it\'s time to make a decisions.
5. Good written and spoken English.
6. Practical workshop background is plus.
7. NDT experience and valid certificate is plus.
制浆造纸专业，有相关造纸机械背景优先；英语要能正常交流，该岗位需要经常出差。

岗位职责:
1.协助部门做好公司的质量管理工作。
2.在本公司内贯彻执行公司质量管理制度和实施细则。
3.培训检验员。包括质量理论，与产品相关的信息，具体尺寸的检验方法培训。
4.负责分厂的产品质量。关注各分厂每天每周的质量状况，组织纠正预防的制定与实施，负责评估其有效性。
5.编制过程检验作业指导书。
6.对本公司违反质量管理制度和实施细则的行为及人员及时制止，并向上级领导汇报。
7.完成部门负责人交办临时任务。  

工作地点： 江阴文林   提供食宿，无锡市内每天班车往返
任职资格:
1.大专以上学历，相关专业或有相关工作经历二年以上。
2.责任心强，综合素质好。
3.擅长沟通，个性主动，有强烈的进取心，愿意接受挑战，能承受压力，有合作意识和团队精神。

岗位职责:

2、	负责编写、完善有关公司安全生产、消防、工业卫生、职业安全，环境保护和控制等方面的文件和程序，审查安全技术操作规程，并监督执行情况。
3、	负责ESH相关培训，包括安全生产、消防演练、急救演习，在生产现场能及时指出、纠正、处理或协助处理员工违章操作事件。

6、	负责公司食堂、宿舍、清洁、安保管理等后勤工作。

2、	大专以上学历，专业不限，环境工程或安全工程专业优

无锡某城区法院聘用人员招聘简章
根据我院审判业务工作需要，经研究决定招聘劳动合同制工作人员3名，为本院非正式在编人员，不享受公务员及事业单位工作人员工资福利待遇。
一、报考岗位及条件
岗位：书记员
人数：3名
岗位要求：
1、良好的政治素质，品行端正，遵纪守法，志愿从事人民法院劳动合同制审判辅助工作，本人未受过刑事处罚、行政处罚和党政纪律处分，直系或旁系亲属中没有受过刑事处罚；
2、大专及以上学历，法律专业优先；
3、年龄35周岁以下（1980年1月1日以后出生），无锡本市户籍(不含江阴、宜兴)；
4、身体健康；
5、具备计算机操作技能以及良好的听打、看打能力；
6、拥有驾驶执照，会熟练驾驶者优先录用。
二、报名时间、方式及要求
报名时间：即日起
报名方式：如实填写《报名表》，发送至yyca123456@126.com。
资格审核：用人单位对《报名表》进行资格初审后，电话通知应聘人员带好学历证、身份证、户口簿原件和复印件、近期正面免冠一寸彩照1张，由用工单位进行资格复审。如发现伪造、隐瞒、弄虚作假的，一律取消录用资格。
报名表格下载见：http://www.nchr.com.cn/files/聘用人员报名表.xls
三、考试
1、应聘书记员需参加技能测试，占考试总成绩的50％。选用熟悉的输入法进行计算机录入技能（听打、看打）考试。依技能测试成绩从高分到低分，按拟招聘人数1:3的比例确定面试人员。
2、参加面试，占考试总成绩的50％。
依上述两项总成绩从高分到低分予以录用。
3、体检。
4、政审。
四、录用
经考试、体检、政审合格的拟聘用人员，按聘用人员的有关规定办理录用手续。
五、试用
新招聘的合同制辅助人员实行试用期，期限为两个月，试用期满后，经考核符合条件的，由劳务公司与其签订劳动合同，建立劳动关系后派遣至我院从事审判辅助工作。经试用不符合条件的，进入劳动力市场另行择业。
六、有关待遇
书记员月收入2300元左右,按规定缴纳社保金等。
七、续聘
聘用合同期限为二年，聘用合同期满，经考核合格，若岗位需要，受聘人员愿意续聘的，聘用单位可续聘其从事原岗位工作，续订劳动合同。

As supply chain engineer you play an important role in the supply chain.  You will be responsible for the design of warehouse to achieve a lean warehouse in Bolaite.

Tooling management and maintenance in warehouse.
Update and maintenance the Material file base on forecast and supplier lead time to guarantee the delivery performance and lower stock level.
Other task assigned by supply chain team leader.

职位名称: 行政人事专员(要求懂日语)
岗位职责:
沃格自动化科技(无锡)有限公司是一家专业承接工业自动化设备的科技型企业.沃格自动化拥有一支优秀,成熟的专业技术队伍,公司管理团队经验丰富,其主要成员有长期海外工作经验并在工业行业跨国公司工作多年,具有行业经营方面的优势.公司始终致力于支持客户成为各自行业的市场领先者.
公司实行做5休2制度,交社保,节假日按照国家规定的执行,工作满一年后有带薪年假.如需加班,会按照国家规定发放加班工资.各项制度较为完备.
公司成立以来业务发展迅速,升职空间较大,希望具有以下素质的人员加盟我司:
1.	日语口语熟练,愿意学习设备方面的专业日语词汇,最好能够熟悉日本文化,善于跟日本人打交道
2.	能够熟练使用办公室软件,最好有人事,行政方面的相关经验；
3.	做事仔细认真,有担当.能够独立完成领导交待的任务
4.       有驾照者从优录取.
任职资格:
1.       日语口语熟练,愿意学习设备方面的专业日语词汇,最好能够熟悉日本文化,善于跟日本人打交道
2.	能够熟练使用办公室软件,最好有人事,行政方面的相关经验；
3.	做事仔细认真,有担当.能够独立完成领导交待的任务
4.       有驾照者从优录取.
公司自2012年8月份成立以来发展迅速,目前内勤部主管一职空缺,所以只要你聪明肯学,公司能为你提供较大的升职空间.欢迎你的加盟.

岗位职责:
JOB SUMMARY:
1.	Develop and maintain a strong knowledge of the types of products typically being developed/bought by all significant players in the mattress manufacturing sector in the markets detailed above.
2.	Through co-operation with overseas colleagues, develop and maintain a strong knowledge of the products being developed/bought by customers operating in the other markets where Bekaert Textiles operates, in particular the major markets of the US, Europe, UK and Australia.
3.	Proactively work with the BTCN Sales team, in-house designers, production team and overseas colleagues in order to develop new products for offer to customers within the markets detailed above.
4.	Support the Sales team (which includes Agents) in providing samples of products which are fit for purpose in a timely and professional manner. Specifically, preparing collections of samples which fulfil the specific needs of each customer. 
5.	Place and follow up orders of samples or commercial goods via the AS/400 system. 
6.	Follow up at customer level on status of orders of samples and commercial goods and execute additional actions (internally/externally) as required.
7.	Confirm receipt of order to the customer.
8.	Confirm date of delivery to the customer and report on deviations.
9.	Elaborate rolling delivery forecasts in cooperation with the customer and Sales Director.
10.	Maintain direct, frequent contact to customers in context of the development, ordering and planning process.
11.	Manage the inventory of customer references according to specific agreements or general rules set by the company.
12.	Analyse and communicate changes in the purchase behaviour of customers; establish alert system for changes and proactively contact the customer for clarification.
13.	Represent Sales team in time of absence.
14.	Follow up payments of customers in cooperation with Accounting.
15.	Keep the AS/400 updated in all relevant data (contacts, references, prices, payment terms, etc.)
任职资格:
QUALIFICATION:
·College graduate with 2-3 years sales assistant experience in an international company
·Foreign exposure such as study/work/travel abroad is a plus
·Experience in the textile industry is a plus
·Customer oriented,courteous,honest
·Strong sense of responsibility and commitment
·High degree of team spirit
·Fluent in written and spoken English
·Familiar with PC operation(Windows,Office)
·All-round assistant mentality

10.Release & follow all PO to supplier to ensure delivery on time

12.Other jobs from Supervisor or department Manager
任职资格:
Requirement：
1.University degree (engineering degree is preferred)
2.Prefer the mechanical/fastener work experience.
3.1~3yr sourcing experience, be familiar with sourcing/supplier development process
4.Good experience on program management and supplier management / development
5.Fluent in Chinese & English communication and written skill.
6.PPAP level 3, GD&T, Program management basic knowledge.
7.Willing to travelling in domestic independently.

岗位职责:
Main Responsibilities
1, Placing purchase order according to materials requirement plan / PR. Track the PO delivery to meet the request of timely production.
2, Maintain and check the accuracy of the purchasing price in SAP.
3, Support Sourcing for negotiation and execution of material cost down project.
4, Purchase order management including confirmation, reschedule in, reschedule out and cancellation. Control Supplier OTD.
5, Monitor raw materials inventory and deposition of OE materials.
6, Purchasing of indirect materials as Consumable materials, Toolings etc. according to regulations
任职资格:
Qualifications: 
1, Major in materials, trade, electronics etc.
2, Above 3 years work experience, manufacture plant purchasing experience preferred.
3,  Experienced with SAP system.
4, Reading and writing in English, familiar with MS Office.
5,  Good communication skill , keep patience and withstand pressure;

岗位职责:
1. 完善优化现有供应商群。
2. 根据内部需求寻找选择优质供应商。
3. 与供应商的日常沟通：付款、交货、质量等问题，订单、合同的谈判与签署。
4. 新项目的报价，项目的管理以及和其他部门的沟通/合作，并提供良好的采购服务。
5. 年度价格谈判，完成成本控制指标。
6. 与集团采购中心的日常沟通。
任职资格:
1. 大专以上学历， 机电一体化、机械电气类专业优先，三年以上非生产物料采购经验。
2. 有机电设备采购项目经验，熟悉备品备件供应市场，并有较强的商业敏锐度。
3. 沟通能力强，善于与其他部门协调合作。
4.有责任心、诚实守信，具有良好的职业操守。
5.良好的英语基础，熟练使用ERP系统。

岗位职责:
1.熟悉发动机装配,热试的物理过程.
2.了解发动机上下线的系统流程.
3.新品及验证性发动机在线问题跟踪，记录，协调解决及后续问题汇总.
4.新品发动机PDA的实施。
5.与各部门良好的协调，沟通能力.
6.主管指定的其他任务.
任职资格:
1.中技/高中以上学历
2.简单的英文阅读能力
3.基本的计算机操作能力，Excel,word的使用
4.5年以上相关行业工作经验。

职位名称: Quotation System Administrator报价系统管理员
岗位职责:
The Quotation System Administrator is working in Manufacturing & Logistics division and reports directly to Quotation System Manager. He/She will be responsible for:

-Manage the administration of the Quotation System independently in China;

-Ensure data quality and up to date price and cost/MFC information with efficient processes;

Quotation System maintenance includes
-Text & Templates needs to meet “Corporate Identity Guidelines”
-Translation needs to be pre-checked before upload 
-One uniform configurator structure (Business Unit based)
-Costs evaluation is based on standardized procedure
-Costing is executed annually, adaptations during the year are only in exceptional cases exactable and need allowance by Business Unit Head Asia

- Contact each Business Unit and collect their requirements for data/information which shall be provided through the Quotation System, discuss until there is a final agreement

-Set up the requested data/information in the Quotation System and cross check the set up with and get it confirmed by the Business Unit

-Provide support in Sales-Quotation to China and Southeast Asia;

-Provide support in Project Fulfillment to China and Southeast Asia(order processing, logistics)

2、生产品质管理

岗位职责:
1.选择最优生产流程，编制产品的工艺文件，制定材料消耗工艺定额；
Define optimal product process parameters and fix them in process documents, make fixed material consumption

Responsible for first trial out production including complete report and other necessary documentation (e.g. work instruction and work flow) ;

Training of production personnel by hand over of new production equipment.

Supervise the implementation of the process discipline.

To accomplish other jobs appointed by department leader

3.协助和支持车间工艺平面图及生产线的布置；
Support layout plan for workshop and assembly
4.深入生产现场，指导车间一线生产及时解决生产中出现的技术问题，改善工艺技术服务工作。
Guidance of workshop production line, solve technical problems in time, improve technology services;
5.	负责新产品首样的完整报告和其他必要的文档(如工作说明、工作流程)
Responsible for first trial out production including complete report and other necessary documentation (e.g. work instruction and work flow) ;
6.	根据新设备运行情况培训生产人员
Training of production personnel by hand over of new production equipment.
1.	配合设备维护人员做好工艺设备的保养工作， 
Work together with equipment maintenance to improve prevented maintenance job, 
2.	监督执行工艺纪律
Supervise the implementation of the process discipline.
3.   完成部门领导交付的其他工作
To accomplish other jobs appointed by department leader

Good at Pro/E, UG and AutoCAD software;

Good at English or German listening, speaking and writing;

Good professional moral and team work spirit.

职位分类: 质量管理/测试经理(QA/QC经理)
岗位职责: 全面负责品质部各项工作和人员的管理
任职资格:
1.大专以上学历，机械或管理相关专业，具有良好的英语读写能力及内审员资格，本科学历和具有国家注册质量工程师资格优先；
2.五年以上品质管理相关工作经验，能独立组织编写质量体系文件，质量管理制度和规定,熟悉ISO9001、ISO14001、TS16949和QC080000体系，推动质量环境体系在公司各部门的落实；
3.具有机械或汽车行业品质管理经验，熟悉冲压、注塑、焊接生产工艺流程和来料、现场、成品的质量检验管理流程；
4.熟悉TS16949五大手册和QC七大工具，有较强的领导力、执行力及沟通协调能力，良好的团队合作精神。

岗位职责:
1.	根据生产计划进行人员的安排与调配。	
2.	人员加班安排及考勤。
3.	人员岗位技能的提高培训, 新产品知识的学习，员工的技能考核。
4.	进行员工的绩效考评及奖惩有关事实依据记录。
5.	氮气切换及点检。过炉废产品的更换管理。
6.	冲床生产计划确认与跟踪。
7.	劳保用品确认、辅助耗材的确认。
8.	生产检具、叠装模板清单及时更新、待处理品管理、物料管理。
9.	现场安全管理和质量管控。
10.	配合试验及试验的跟踪。
11.	主导生产线换型作业。
12.	现场标准化作业检查。
13.	当班生产追溯记录检查确认、相关生产报表填写上报。
14.	及时向主管汇报异常情况、及时响应质量问题。
15.	员工沟通和员工关系管理。
16.	现场5S管理。
17.	当班员工安全及纪律管理。
18.	改善和提高生产效率，设备OEE和FTT。
19.	主管分配的其它工作。
任职资格:
1.	性别不限，学历高中及中专以上；
2.	汽车零配件或机械行业3年以上工作经验；
3.	会操作常用办公软件如Word, Excel等；
4.	有较强的组织及应变能力，执行力强；
5.	具备改善思维和精益生产相关知识；
6.	理解能力、表达能力强；
7.	良好的沟通能力和团队合作精神；
8.	工作积极主动性强，能独立解决问题。

岗位职责:
1.	遵守公司及部门规章制度。
2.	熟悉机床特性，严格按照机床操作规范操作机床，确保人员和机床的安全。
3.	做好机床/行车/堆高车等设备的日常维护保养工作，并填写相关记录。
4.	严格按照产品作业指导书操作加工，并做好自检工作，填写相关记录。
5.	熟悉产品加工工艺，密切关注加工过程出现的异常现象，以保证人员、工具和机床的安全。
6.	服从工作安排，保质、保量、按时完成生产任务。
7.	按要求填写质量跟踪单，提高质量意识。
8.	了解刀具的知识，按要求更换刀具，刀片并及时领取。
9.	认真填写当班记录，做好交接班。
10.	认真做好当班5S。
11.	生产中出现的问题，要及时跟当班班长或Monitor沟通，不要知情不报，以免造成更大的问题或者损失。
12.	确保现场使用的检具、工具等于操作指导书的要求一致，有问题，及时反馈给班长或monitor。
13.	检查并确保现场使用的检具、工具等处于有效期之内，及时汇报并督促处理超出期限的器具。
任职资格:
1.	专业：机电或相关专业。学历：大专或更高学历。
2.	有志从事制造工作，有CNC设备操作经验者优先。
3.	敬业、独立、自励，有良好的团队精神
4.	善于沟通，工作积极主动，能够适应倒班工作。
5.	良好的英语读写能力及基本的口语交流能力。

岗位职责:
1.负责车间内各机器设备的检修，保证能正常运转
2.能发现问题，并及时解决问题
3.领导交待的其它相关事宜
任职资格:
1.大专及以上学历，机电一体化专业优先
2.有电工证
3.有过3-5年设备维修方面的工作经验
4.30岁以上
5.诚实，能吃苦耐劳

岗位职责:
1、负责生产产品数量及质量、生产安全、生产效率等方面的管理；
2、负责现场5S管理； 
3、负责员工纪律监督管理
4、负责生产线工艺要求的监督管理
5、负责生产线部分改进项目
6、完成领导交办的其他事宜。
任职资格:
1、大专及以上学历，机械类相关专业，25-35岁；
2、具有2年以上生产管理经验，管理生产活动中的各种活动和资源，以达到公司对成本控制、产品数量以及质量、安全、生产效率等方面的要求；
3、具备生产现场管理能力，熟悉5S，有较强的组织管理能力、协调能力；
4、熟悉使用常用电脑软件。

岗位职责:
1、负责主导建立公司品质管理体系，建立、实施及完善品质控制的各项工作流程；
2、负责根据产品技术规格制定具体可行的检验标准和检验方法；
3、负责成品来料检验，编制品质报告并跟踪异常处理；
4、负责持续改善和提升产品品质，向厂商传递和指导相关质量标准和产品要求；
5、负责处理产品客诉，对用户反映的质量问题及时提出处理、改进意见；
6、负责产品认证或委外产品检测的执行。
任职资格:
1、大专及以上学历，机械类相关专业，熟悉机械类产品测试原理及测试流程；
2、2年以上机械产品质量管理经验，有相关检测经验者优先。
3、能独立制订产品检验标准、检测方法、检验作业指导书等文件和培训指导；
4、熟悉QC七大手法和AQL验货标准，熟练使用使用各类办公软件。

岗位职责:
1.去指定工厂或协作单位进行产品检验
2.进行相关技术资料和文件的处理
任职资格:
1. 男性， 大专及以上学历，35周岁以下
2. 机械或液压行业有3年左右工作经验
3. 能看懂简单英语版本文件
4. 机械、液压机械专业或相近工科背景
5. 熟悉应用软件（CAD, excel等软件）

岗位职责:
1. 协助品质主管开展本部门的相关工作；
2. 制定检验作业指导书；
3. 负责对检验员工作的检查、管理、信息沟通与协调；
4. 负责产品外观质量的最终检验（FQC）、出货检验（OQC）和产品审核；
5. 配合做好过程审核、产品审核、质量/环境管理体系审核。
任职资格:
1.机械工程类或管理类，大专以上学历，英语良好；
2.汽车行业质量领域三年以上工作经验；
3.掌握质量和统计工具，比如：潜在失效模式及其影响分析、鱼骨图、试验设计、统计过程控制、审核、问题解决方法（8D及3x5why等）；掌握质量管理标准（ISO TS 16949等）；
4.熟练运用Excel、Word、PPT等办公软件。

This function is responsible for one shift/product/function operation.
1. Fulfill production plan with high efficiency, high quality and low cost.
2. Ensure a stable flow production, investigate bottlenecks, work together with your team and train employees for the right execution of their work tasks. Drive continuous productivity measures by continuously improving easy work execution.  
3. Shopfloor management, shift start and end information, investigate line disturbances, update shop floor management board, interface meetings and information sharing, positive culture buildup.
4. To manage production area EHS, 5S and 3i program.

8. Investigate customer complain and provide corrective actions. Regularly inform your team about quality problems and the updates at quality gates.
9. Decentral warehouse management. Lead/support regular(annual) stocktaking, ensure inventory accuracy.
10. Team member performance evaluation, and define development plan.

1. College Diploma is required in mechanical / Industrial engineering / automatic / equipments / electrical. 
2. 5+ years working experience in foreign companies. 
3. Fluent english (german preferred) in oral and read/write.

1.负责公司进料、制程、出货日常检验工作的统筹安排及督导审核；
2.负责分析、解决进料、制程、出货中所出现的质量问题，处理品质异常及品质改善；
3.负责制定各种与产品相关的检验标准与文件；
4.参与新品工程打合，协助品保对新产品开发的检验与资料提供；
5.配合并协助体系内外审，客户稽核对应等；
6.部门间工作协调和人力调度，配合上级交办的其他事务。
任职资格:
1.机械行业3年以上品质检验相关工作经验，熟悉钣金、注塑技术规范和检验规程；
2.熟悉进料/制程/出货流程，熟练运用QC七大手法等各种品质工具；
3.了解汽车件生产及检验流程，能够运用SPC、FMEA、MSA、APQP、PPAP五大工具；
4.熟练使用三次元、投影仪等各种计量检测仪器；
5.熟练使用AUTOCAD或PRO/E三维软件以及OFFICE办公软件；
6.了解ISO9001、TS16949、QC080000体系知识；
7.大专以上学历，具备一定的英语能力；
8.具有一定的管理和沟通协调能力，良好的团队合作精神。

2.吃苦耐劳，团队合作精神。

岗位职责:
Responsibilities:
Project purchasing management:
•	Ensuring the timely selection of suppliers taking into consideration the material group strategy as well as the early integration of suppliers in the development process. 
•	Realisation of new launches (serial components or external tools) and active participation in the phase-out planning of assembly groups / components.
•	Coordination of supplier “Kick-Off meetings”.
•	Integration of supplier innovations.
•	Ensuring the use of standardised assembly groups / components.
Supplier management:
•	Supplier assessment, supplier selection and supplier development taking into account the current material group strategies.
•	 Evaluation of inquiries and tender evaluation as well as decision-making considering internal contract awarding conferences under participation of divisions such as R&D, Quality and Production.
•	Negotiation of costs and conditions (incl. batch sizes, packaging and shipping concepts) by making use of a qualified supplier portfolio and all procurement leverages.
•	Conclusion of contracts on an international basis together with Legal Affairs.
•	Ensuring material supply in case of critical situations with missing parts.
•	Supplier risk management.
•	Supplier relationship management, incl. top management meetings.
Material group management:
•	 Acting as internal supplier of information in the field of procurement market research and trend scouting.
•	Group-wide coordination and implementation of a pre-defined material group strategy on an international basis.
•	Alignment of qualified supplier portfolios.
Quality management:
•	Initiation and execution of initial audits.
•	Active participation in the component validation process.
•	Execution of quality workshops for supplier qualification.
•	Charging of suppliers in case quality is not in conformity (“non-quality”).
Data management:
•	Material price planning and traceability for assembly groups / components.
•	Ensuring maintenance and up-to-dateness of master data.
•	Compilation of delivery schedules and initial orders for assembly groups / components.
•	Change management in the Engineering Change Management Process.
•	Timely handover of all documents to Series Purchasing in accordance with SOP and Part Approval.
•	Ensuring the availability of current supplier documents (e.g. RoHS, REACH, audit certificates, supplier posters, contractual attachments).
•	Standardised, process-oriented filing.
任职资格:
Requirements:

Education / Know-how and experience:
Bachelor (engineering or business economics studies at University of Applied Sciences), 4-6 years of vocational experience, analytical skills, highly flexible, ability to work in a team, communication skills, assertiveness and business-fluent English, MS Office and SAP skills.

岗位职责:
Main Responsibilities:
1) Helps the project team define the U-Shin requirement: QCD objectives,expression in functional specifications, schedules. Based on his/her knowledge of family purchasing strategies, he/she challenges make or buy choices, ensures that technological choices will not "lock in" the choice of suppliers, challenges the breakdown of the final product into different components/functions, and ensures that component standards are complied with.
2) Ensures that the right conditions exist so that the best suppliers are able to propose the best QCD solutions.
·Conducts consultations with the supplier base(including Panel 300 suppliers) and any other potential suppliers.
·Participates in the selection of suppliers,in close collaboration with the family buyers(note:the latter have the right to veto choices).
·Uses functional specifications as a basis of consultation and makes sure that suppliers' ideas are taken into account.
·Integrates suppliers very early (phase 0 or 1) and gives them access to the project platform.
·Initiates, when necessary, value analyses to meet target costs.
·Facilitates communication between suppliers and the various project team members.
3) Manages the state of progress of suppliers' projects and validates the key stages.
·Formalizes the U-Shin requirement files (VRF) with the supplier.
·Checks that suppliers’ schedules consistent with the project schedule and makes sure they are complied with.
·Formalizes, with the PQA specialists and suppliers, the scheduling of PQA stages and checks that they are performed correctly.
·Organizes end of phase reviews at the supplier and participates in them with the PQA specialists.
·Draws up the QCD indicators and monitors their evolution.
·Ensures that supplier projects comply with U-Shin’s procedures (contract signings, etc.)
4) Provides feedback from the purchasing department and remains in coordination with the relevant family buyers and PQA specialists.
5) For P2s, may be called on to perform Purchasing Marketing to look for suppliers of new technologies (when necessary).
6) Responsible for identifying the environment factors for own department and area.
任职资格:
Qualifications:
- Bachelor degree above majored in Mechanical Engineering.
- 3-5 years'experience in Purchasing, R&D, Industrialization, Quality or Project function(preferably in the automotive sector). Also technical background is a must.
- Knowledge of global purchasing injection molding is a must.
- Project management sense is a must.
- Excellent English in oral and written.

岗位职责:
Supply of material based on customer requirements at the lowest price whilst ensuring quality and on-time delivery.
1.	Commodity strategies
Implement Commodity strategies to ensure long-term, cost-efficient supply of materials.
2.	Standardization
Implement and ensure usage of globally defined methods, processes and systems to ensure high process efficiency and process compliance (e.g. compliant Purchase-to-Pay (P2P) process, Procurement guidelines, IT systems).
3.	Monitor the markets worldwide
to create a basis for deciding the optimum sourcing strategy and cooperate with the best suppliers.
4.	Procurement strategies
Define and implement Procurement strategies (which are not covered by Commodity strategies) based on conducted demand, market and supplier analysis to ensure long-term, cost-efficient and reliable on-time supply of materials in the required quality. 
5.	Negotiations
Prepare and conduct negotiations for medium to high Purchasing Volumes to obtain highest feasible savings.
6.	Savings and relevant KPI
Generate, document and implement savings, e.g. CNI; plan, monitor and report on relevant KPI
to contribute to the success of the business and make results transparent.
7.	Supplier Management
Support Supplier Management processes (e.g. qualification, selection, evaluation, development, classification); update supplier evaluation systems to obtain and develop the best suppliers and ensure transparency.
8.	Customer Interface
Ensure a close cooperation with Internal Customers (requisitioners) to ensure customer care and early involvement.
任职资格:
1.	Bachelor degree and above, major in business administration, logistics or related areas.
2.	2 years working experience as buyer. Be familiar with purchasing procedure, supplier selection and management, etc.
3.	Good customer mindset, negotiation skill and learning ability.
4.	Be familiar with SAP and good oral and written English.

岗位职责:
职责说明 Job Description 

1.	制定、完善并监督执行学校行政规章制度和工作流程，制定并实施中长期规划、工作计划，督促本部门人员完成部门职责范围内的各项工作任务；
Formulate, improve and supervise the implementation of the school’s administrative rules, regulations and work processes. Formulate and implement medium and long-term plans and work plans, and urge department members to fulfill all tasks within the Department's responsibilities.                   

2.	组织实施接待活动和会务工作，与政府对接协调事务，做好各项后期保障服务；
Organize and carry out reception and meeting preparation. Coordinate with government. Oversee all admin. services.

3.	组织、协调各类外部内部大型活动包括学术论坛，学校年会等；
Organize and coordinate various external/internal large-scale activities including academic forum, annual staff party and so on;

4.	学校日常行政管理工作及各项后勤保障工作，包括车辆、食堂、清洁、保安、行政采购等；
Manage school’s daily administrative work and all kinds of logistic support, including vehicle, canteen, cleaning, security and administrative procurement, etc.
5.	管理学校学生宿舍，确保学生在校期间的安全；
Manage school dormitories to ensure the safety of the students during the school period.

6.	管控学校行政费用，有效组织实施采购管理工作；
Control administrative expenses. Effectively organize and implement the procurement management.

7.	建立和完善学校固定资产管理体系，监管固定资产日常管理和维护，建立台账，定期组织固定资产清查盘点，形成盘点报告。
Establish and improve school's fixed assets management system. Supervise the daily management and maintenance of fixed assets, set up ledgers, organize regular inventory check, and form a stocktaking report.

8.	完成领导交办的其他事项。
Other duties assigned by supervisor

- Provide administrative support for  GM (executive) for day-to-day -business operations.
- Manage appointments and make travel arrangements
- Co-ordinate reports, activities amongst the department
- Handle confidential information and maintain the security of the executive’s records and files.
- Gather, compile, verify, and analyze information for use in documents such as memos, letters, reports, speeches, presentations, and news releases.
- Prepare and follow-up on meeting minutes 
- Perform other administrative tasks, e.g. managing the car and driver, using independent judgment and discretion. 
- Plan, organize, and schedule own workload so that these activities are completed accurately and on time. These activities may include preparing documents and presentation materials screening and responding to incoming correspondence, inquiries, and phone calls drafting letters and official information releases arranging and attending meetings taking and distributing minutes.
- Prepare promotional stuff and perform marketing promotion activities;
- Market research and data analysis preparation

- Outgoing personality with high level of service mindset
- Good at using Microsoft software, including Excel, Word, PowerPoint
- Excellent in both oral and written English
- Good team player, honest with integrity, and willing to help when needed
- Can work under pressure

Sandvik has presented a new Human Resources delivery model and organizational structure. HR Services organization has been introduced and will be a very important role for us to enable a high performing organization by working close with the business. Main focus is to provide value added globally consistent HR advisory & specialists services to Sandvik employees & line managers across all business areas. 

We are now looking for HR Services Specialist to Greater China Region. The location for this position is in Wuxi, Jiangsu Province, China. 

Key performance areas: 
As HR Services Specialist, you will need to provide expert advice, guidance and coaching to line managers across all business areas within the country or region and ensure quality delivery of complex & specialist activities within your area of expertise, or across a number of areas of expertise. 

You will be responsible for using sound judgment and discretion to interpret policies and procedures and apply them appropriately for the situation. You will also be offering coaching, advice and guidance to Sandvik line managers in order to actively raise their understanding of and expertise in people management and HR issues including reinforcing the delivery model for HR services by directing the customer to the correct channel. 

Furthermore, you may exceptionally require providing face to face support to managers in high risk or complex situations and in some cases will be responsible for more than one Sandvik site or providing support across a number of specialist service areas 

This position reports to HR Services Lead - Specialist and you must be flexible to travel within the country where required to give support across multiple sites.
任职资格:
Your profile: 
We are looking for someone with a University degree or equivalent experience within the relevant function and minimum 5 years of experience working in HR generalist or specialist roles providing services to Line Managers. 

We expect that you have strong HR operations background with excellent business understanding and customer interaction skills. Good command of English both in written and oral is also required.

岗位职责:
The position would directly report to Engineering  Manager, below please refer to the job description:  


Key performance areas: 
•Production process optimizes.
•Abide by the work arrangements by engineering manager, complete the goal and task of the present position posts task in time.
•Optimize and improving the production processes to continuous improvement at the scene   and enhance product quality, resolve the issue which is exceptional in production, saving manufacturing costs, reducing production costs, etc.
•Familiar with Pro-E, Auto Cad;
•Optimize and improve equipment operating system to enhance the utilization of capacity of equipment.
•Create the production report to provide the statistical analysis, create and improve the standard of product technical file such as the standard of machine operation, quality inspection standard.
•Strengthen safety management in special domain, such as production safety, labor protection, environmental protection, support the training of workers.
•To participate in and work towards existing projects to develop new processes to provide the next generation of products.
•To ensure the continuity of the existing production processes and the enhancement of output beyond existing levels. Including improvement in delivery accuracy, reduction in lead times and increase productivity whilst ensuring that all equipment and processes meet all current and future EHS legislation.
•To assist in and design, specify, procure and test new production equipment, tools, jigs and fixtures.
•The production of technical reports on all facets of the job holder’s activities for record, reference and recommendation of future actions.
•To initiate and deliver projects on time within a specified budget whilst meeting all agreed criteria within the scope of the project.
•Monitoring and intervention of production needs, to use the specific skills of the jobholder, to resolve potential problems often before they arise. To analyze, often using modern computer software, the existing production processes and work flows and to propose and investigate differing and less time consuming and costly alternatives.
•The introduction of new or improved equipment or processes require detailed operating and training directives to be issued and driven through the organization by the job holder.
•Reports technical work quickly and accurately by written reports, E-mail, telephone conversations and to meetings.
•Responsible for Movex system maintain, create new product structure, check reporting information and correct wrong input.
•Write working instructions for production
任职资格:
Your profile: 
•Bachelor or Master degree,  
•With Mechanical or Powder Metallurgy or Metal Materials background.
•Minimum 3 years-experience as process engineer or related position at industrial company.
•Good leadership, problem-solving, negotiation and persuasion skills 
•Good communicative and organizational skills
•Mastery of English language (reading, speaking & writing)
As a person you are proactive, self-motivated and one with lot of initiative, courage and integrity and a business minded, result oriented attitude. You also have strong communication skills and can work in an English environment.

职位名称: 同步器应用工程主管/经理
岗位职责:
1.Introduce Diehl technical capability, new product, application experience to customer in order to support sales team to development new customers or new projects
2.Interface with customers to fully understand customers’ technical requirements and to communicate with customers through customer necessary means
3.Preview and understanding of customer technical requirement for existing and brand new projects
4.Transfer and discussion of technical demand of customer with internal R&D dept. in order to ensure the customer demand are met finally
5.Proposal offering to R&D for design and solution initialization if necessary
6.Review design and solution together with R&D engineers to finalize technical offer/solution to customers
7.Set up internal test plan and test specifications with testing dept. together with project manager and sales manager
8.External coordination with customer validation engineers to set up validation plan of our products, and follow up and support all tests conducted on customer side until releasing is done, if necessary.
9.Work together with R&D to analyze problems happen related to our products in customer side and responsible to give technical feedback to customer in very quick and proactive manner.
10.keep close contact with customer engineering dept. to follow up our performance on existing projects and follow up customer new product/project tendency to help sales to identify new opportunity in time. And get back competitor’s technical information and study and analyze competitor’s products, which is similar to our products and technology
11.Keep close contact with R&D in Wuxi and Germany to introduce latest technology and transfer it to commercial benefit of company.
12.Work together with sales, project manager and R&D to set up time plan of new development project or technical change on existing project(Product change management)
13.New project follow up on technical development aspect
14.In charge of management and follow up of customer complain on technical aspect and keep filing
15.Document management for customer technical support
16.Support in commercial topics where technical input is required
任职资格:
1. Good communication skills with technical dept. on customer side
2. Must be able to design and read engineering drawing and give other engineers clear and meaningful instructions which are essential to generate qualified drawings
3, Familiar with design software such as Auto CAD, Pro-E, CATIA, etc.
4, Must be Open minded and have innovative thinking
5, Customer orientation and proactive character
6, At least 5 years technical working experience in transmission product as R&D engineer or application engineer
7, Good understanding of TS16949;

职位名称: Customer Quality Engineer/客户质量工程师
岗位职责:
The main mission of this position is improving customer satisfaction for our GIS business through: Setting good communication channel to understand customer requirement and quickly response for customer complaint.

1. Responsible for customer quality problem solving, working with cross functional team to identify root cause and generate corrective action plan, fully communicate with customer as the interface of GIS factory.
2. Contribute to the performances of after delivery quality enhancement and customer satisfaction upgrade by pushing internal continuous improvement through cross functions. 
3. Maintain customer complaint database, ensure the traceability of problem solving. Regular report after delivery quality performance to management and highlight big problem and progress of actiion implementation. 
4. Work together with service department or project manager doing failure analysis on customer site in case of emergency accident, and make quality investigation report for root cause.
5. Coordinate product returned, customer visit, monitor after delivery NCC reduction and related process optimization.
6. To analyze the failure or defects and solve the issue on site as one expert if necessary.
任职资格:
1. Sufficient knowledge of HV switchgear products. Such as the function of each elements, related standards, application and how to do relevant tests etc. 
2. Be familiar with Quality management and statistic tools. Such as such as six sigma, 8D, 5WHY, …

Have at least one year quality management experience in foreign invested company.
Bachelor degree (or above) in major of mechanical or Electric engineering
English (german) communication. Have no barriers to communicate with German colleagues whether oral or written

职位分类: 质量管理/测试主管(QA/QC主管)
岗位职责:
1、根据公司发展战略及经营计划，制定年度质量计划，为重大质量管理决策提供支持；
2、负责公司进货检验、过程检验及出厂检验的策划和实施，组织进行不合格品评审处置；

5、引进吸收质量管理技术，提高质量管理水平；

16、根据质量部所负责的过程编制管理评审材料，进行绩效及趋势分析，参与管理评审；
17、完成上级领导交办的其他工作。

1、通晓IATF/TS16949质量管理体系、产品检验标准和产品质检相关知识
2、具备机电专业知识、企业管理等方面的知识
3、有较强的领导能力、判断与决策能力、人际能力、沟通能力、影响力、计划与执行能力

岗位职责:
.Supervises, tests compliance of all materials and services. Analyzes defects in process,

 . Min. 8 years work experience in quality or in production for mechanical or electrical industry, prefer automobile industry.

. High problem solving & trouble shooting ability, with strong determination & fast response.
. Familiar with QC tools such as Pareto/ histogram/ control chart etc, has the knowledge of SPC/Cp & Cpk /APQP/PPAP/Cause & effect/CTQ/FMEA /ISO 9001/SOP/8D/SCAR/Control plan etc.
. Continuously improvement activity for the supplier & process failure or preventive action for the potential failure.

岗位职责:
Leads or participates in quality planning including 
1. Applies advanced quality Planning tools such as FMEA, process capability analysis , control plans(including optimized statistical sampling plans), measurement system analysis, supplier qualification and PPAPs (Production Part Approval Process), where required
2. Develops, documents and implements quality processes and systems which assure requirements are met or exceeded
3. Incorporates reliability principles into specifications, test plans and other relevant documents
4. Considers the human factor components and their impact on quality initiatives e.g. the change acceleration process (CAP) ergonomics, appropriate corrective and preventive actions for inadverntent human errors, etc.  

Leads or participates in quality control including:
1. Develops, operates and maintains quality control systems (control plans) which assure approved quality levels and standards to meet or exceed customers requirements. 
2. Leads and/or participates in quality audits (internal and external)  of processes and solutions
3. Performs supplier quality management activities including supplier performance assessment, dispositioning purchased product and supplier certification. 
4. Applies statistical methods for product & process control.

Drives continual improvement  in product, processes and costs throughout the supply chain and product life cycle
1. Resolves quality problems (e.g. customer complaints, internal failures) and reduces quality costs using structured problem solving  and closed loop corrective and preventive actions. 
2. Applies metrology and statistical measurement to problem analysis and proposes metrology and statistical methods to improve quality 
 3. Analyzes data relevant to quality inspections and initiatives and generates improvement conclusions and reports.  

Develops and administers quality training programs for all appropriate functions in the organization.
任职资格:
1.本科及以上学历，工科相关专业；
2.1年以上质量工作经验；
3.分析问题找到根本原因解决方案的能力，设计和执行产品质量检验和质量体系审核的经验，熟悉ISO9000和ISO14000良好的沟通能力。

职位分类: 质量管理/测试经理(QA/QC经理)
岗位职责:
1. Create quality plans with control points for adequate point of inspection operations and issuing appropriate documentation for inspections and testing.  Monitor receiving inspection procedures and requirements as well as material storage and traceability. 
2. Supervise and/or conduct inspections at established inspection points. Verify and maintain quality control records. Recruit, train, and support quality personnel to assure effective and competent performance of quality functions and the quality program. 
3. Participates in the review of design, manufacturing, purchasing, and test documentation to assure conformance to quality control standards.  This can include the review of drawings, calculations, specification sheets, testing and inspection standards, vendor inspections and customer contract specifications.  Monitor engineering change notices and related document change control.  Make recommendations regarding facilities, equipment, personnel, procedures, and systems to carry out quality control functions.
4. Additional responsibilities include: Testing and certification of welders in accordance with relevant pressure vessel Codes and regulations.  Review and interpret NDE and test results. Review NDE procedures and personnel qualifications.  Preparation of reports and quality certificates for pressure vessels qualified.
任职资格:
1. Experience in welding, inspection and NDE is a plus. Knowledge of pressure vessel regulations, such as TSG R004, GB 150, GB 151, the ASME Code, Section VIII, Division 1, and other international standards is also required.
2. A Mechanical Engineering degree is required.
3. A solid background with extensive knowledge of the pressure vessel codes and regulations as it relates to metal fabrications and welding. 
4. Familiarity with dimensional inspections and interpreting drawings is absolutely necessary.
5. Good communication skills in English and the ability to work well with people are essential.  
6. Good leadership skills are beneficial.
7. Basic computer skills and proficiency in writing of quality related documents, reports and procedures.

职位分类: 质量管理/测试主管(QA/QC主管)

3.处理日常检验过程中的品质问题，立即向质量经理直接报告量产过程中较严重的品质控制问题
4.分析并总结生产过程中的质量问题，向质量经理报告每周品质控制状况及月度质量报告
5. ISO内审及外部审核的参与
6.生产部员工及QC人员的品质相关事宜的培训
7.投诉的内部追溯性跟踪处理
8.跟进SAP 系统中的QA posting
9.检验记录的储存及管理
10.配对物管理
11.QC 区域的5S 维护
12.经理安排的其他工作

1.本科及以上，高分子材料、机械专业优先；
2.至少有5年的相关工作经验，塑料行业、汽车行业经验者优先；
3.英语口语、书写熟练；
4.熟悉Windows, Office软件,SAP 经验者优先；
5.工作积极主动，关注细节，较强的沟通技能，良好的质量意识，良好的分析问题和解决问题能力。

职位分类: 质量管理/测试经理(QA/QC经理)
岗位职责:
Job Description:

Responsible for SQE and IQA function in site QM department as a functional head. 
Overall:
1. Leading SQE and IQA group towards high performance at quality and productivity.
2. Develop people at their own area.
3. Management system to fulfill TS16949 and ESH (ISO14001, OHSAS18001) and security requirement, continuous improvement.
4. Other tasks assigned by manager.
SQE:
1. Drive supplier chain management covering new supplier qualification, supplier evaluation, improvement and phase out.
2. Handling supplier material related issues, driving problem solving through cross functional coordination and follow up supplier actions.
3. Manage supplier visit, audit, regular management meeting.
4. Manage supplier relevant changes.
IQA:
1. Lead IQA group to perform incoming inspection, arrange and manage task to fulfill incoming demands with agreed cycle time.
2. Provide training to IQA staff .
3. Discuss IQA relevant engineering topics with operation or SQE for any new request/ demand.
4. IQA equipment management covering buy off, maintenance, trouble shooting, calibration and MSA.
任职资格:
Job Requirement:

1. Major in Mechatronics or Industrial Automation or electronics with bachelor degree and above.
2. Min. 5 years supplier quality and IQA management experience.
3. Fluent oral and written English.
4. Good knowledge in TS16949 and quality tools application (SPC, FMEA, MSA, 8D etc).
5. Good logical thinking  and analytic problem solving skill.
6. Team player.
7. Knowledge in semiconductor backend industry.

职位分类: 质量管理/测试经理(QA/QC经理)
岗位职责:
1) Lead a team of quality manager, engineers and operators
2) Oversee managements of supplier, in-process and customer qualities
3) Responsible for yearly policy deployments for quality improvements to meet or exceed a set of quality KPI
4) Roll out yearly quality key focus initiatives with cross-functional teams
5) Work closely with Operation and Engineering teams to fulfill cross-functional KPI; for example Yield, Cost, Speed
6) Manage critical issues; Fast Reaction Team, Task Force and Focus Team to ensure timely and calculated risk assessments and recovery plans
7) Ensure systemic/management root causes and lessons learnt from critical issues are addressed to avoid recurrence
8) Lead customers as well as 3rd parties audits e.g. TS16949 and visits
9) Implement, revamp and oversee important quality systematic; for example change control management, document control
10) Work closely with Segment and Cluster Quality Management to ensure harmonization of key quality initiatives of Infineon 
11) People development; for example regular coaching, competency enhancement for the team
任职资格:
1) Bachelor degree in Engineering (Preferably in Mechanical, Material, Electronics, Chemical, Automation)   
2) Minimum 8 years working experience in quality management (preferably in semiconductor field)
3) Experienced in quality improvement related project management
4) Good knowledge in Quality Management, competent in FMEA, Control Plan, Work Instruction (WI)/Standard Operating Procedure (SOP), Statistical Process Control (SPC), Quality Assurance (QA), abnormality management processes (MRB, 8D) and change control management
5) Professional leadership of team including planning team’s development
6) Able to communicate effectively and constructively both locally and internationally.
7) Possess strong problem solving and analytical skills
8) Proficient in both spoken and written English
9) Ability to perform under stress and in situation conflicting working environments

职位分类: 质量管理/测试经理(QA/QC经理)
岗位职责:
1. Work with R&D and Engineering to define company and product standards and specification. 与研发和工程一起对于公司和产品标准和规格作出定义；
2. Coordinate with outside professional institutions to obtain and update needed trade or product qualification. 与外部专业机构协作获得和更新所需的产品或行业资格。
3. Be responsible for set up an efficient quality control process, incoming inspection and outgoing inspection process for product manufacturing.负责建立有效的产品质量控制流程以及来料检验和发货检验流程；
4. Be ensure the tool and guage which used in production line is qualify; 负责产线使用的计量器具是合格的；
5. To work with Sourcing dept. for supplier evaluation, supplier quality management.和采购部一起负责供应商评估和质量管理； 
6. To review the non-conformance, and arrange analyzes failures, and leading corrective action taken or improvement. 评审不合格品，组织分析失效和采取纠正措施；
7. Act as a leading role in the liaison between manufacturing and customers/suppliers regarding non-conformance to standards and specifications. 负责就质量问题与外部顾客或供应商的联系；
8. Handle customer complain and claim to supplier.处理客户投诉和供应商索赔；
9. Lead Customer Visit and MCC 主导客户拜访和MCC；

1. Requires a bachelor degree in an Engineering related field, preferably in Mechanical Engineering工程类背景本科，机械工程更佳；
2. Deeply understanding ISO 9001 system standard.对质量管理体系有较深的理解；
3. Has at least 5 years work experiences for quality management in manufacturing enterprises, small batch production experience is preferable.至少有5年的制造型企业质量管理经验，小批量生产经验更佳；
4. Good communications and interpersonal skills are essential.良好的沟通和人际交往能力；
5. Can strong to implement, follow up, and push action; 能强有力的去执行，追踪及推行措施；
6. Good English speaking, writing .较好的英语口语和书写；
7. Can work under high pressure较强的抗压能力；
8. Good teamwork and people management skill 良好的团队精神和人员管理能力；

岗位职责:
As an experienced leader of LEAN and Continuous Improvement methods, you will model and teach the necessary systems and behaviors required to implement the Boart Longyear Operating System at the Wuxi, China Manufacturing facility. You will coach and mentor through a high degree of production floor interaction with an emphasis on the adoption of Continuous Improvement tools and behaviors aimed at improving Key Performance Metrics.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
•	Deployment of the Boart Longyear Operating System
•	Act as an internal mentor by defining and leading Continuous Improvement initiatives to increase efficiency and effectiveness of core functions.
•	Champion waste / loss elimination through capability building and on-the-floor experiences.
•	Solve complex problems to root cause through formal methodology application and coach / train others to do the same.
•	Develop Standardized Work and implement at all levels of the facility.
•	Work closely with all functions to achieve lowest possible down time and efficient use of plant and equipment.
•	Partner with process owners to deliver sustainable and repeatable change.
•	Train and mentor department Subject Matter Experts in the application of Continuous Improvement.
•	Apply analysis to improve process control and capability.
•	Develop and prepare metrics and related reports.
任职资格:
Requirements:
•	University or College degree coupled with a minimum of 3 years’ experience coordinating / leading Continuous Process Improvement projects in a similar role.
•	LEAN Six Sigma Green Belt Certification
•	Recognized training in LEAN / Continuous Improvement tools and methods (including: 5-S, Process and Value Stream Mapping, Standard Work, OEE, Root Cause analysis, Statistical Process Control, and Preventive Maintenance)
•	Proficient with Microsoft Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word)
•	Fluently bilingual; written and spoken Mandarin and English

岗位职责:
You have a technical background and a commercial feel. You looking for a dynamic working environment? You believe there is always a better way and love a challenge? We’re looking for a project sourcing engineer at Pan-Asia Gas Technology to be part of our project commodity sourcing team. 

As project sourcing engineer, you design the supply chain of new products and deliver projects on time in full. You will play an active role in creation of the future generation of oil-injected screw and refrigerant dryer products.

You:
1.Contribute to the company’s mission of product leadership and cost leadership by selecting the right supplier base for new products
2.Set up a time frame taking the available resources and priorities into consideration. Coordinate tasks of commodity sourcing to respect to the set project planning
3.Look for innovative ideas in the market and challenge suppliers to come up with innovative solutions
4.Control product cost and set target prices for each part
5.Define and implement sourcing strategies to ensure sustainable quality, deliveries and cost from suppliers
6.Build up commercial and technical knowledge and understanding of raw material price evolution 
7.Implement supplier qualification procedures to ensure right suppliers are being selected.
8.Work according to a lessons learned approach and believe there is always a better way.
任职资格:
Experience requirements
1. Minimum 3 years working experience in manufacturing company
2. Experience with oil-injection screw compressors and refrigerant dryers is a plus
3. Experience in project management is a plus.

 Knowledge / Educational requirements
1. Bachelor Degree or above, major in Mechanical Engineering or related area.
2. Technical knowledge and knowledge of business practices and commercial terms
3. Good knowledge of MS Office and understanding of ERP systems
4. Good command of English and Mandarin (both oral and written)

Personality requirements
1. Strong communication, negotiating and analyzing skills
2. Open minded
3. Being able to work independently 
4. Innovative and Result driven.
5. Customer oriented.

职位名称: 研发高级工程师（大型中央系统）
岗位职责:
1.制冷空调或相近专业/电子电气及自动化相关专业相近专业/本科及以上学历，机械、机电自动化相近专业，有在大金、格力、美的、江森工作经验着优先 
2.6年及以上的暖通空调产品的研发经验，暖通制冷电器的电气控制系统硬件/软件研发经验，具有风冷/水冷热泵空调/高静压风管产品研发经验者优先考虑；暖通制冷电器的结构设计研发经验，熟悉钣金、塑料、模具者优先
3.熟悉空调行业的相关标准，具备独立进行制冷系统部件选型、设计计算及系统逻辑控制功能设计的能力，能够对试验方案策划及数据分析进行把关验收，制定产品设计标准和测试规范、验证方法。具备独立承担空调设备电控系统设计和整体优化；电控部品的设计选型、试验验证和系统集成工作；整机电控的方案论证和持续优化，故障问题的分析解决； 制定电气部品的设计标准和测试、验证方法等工作。负责结构设计整体解决方案的实施,包括产品结构布局、模型图纸的创建及BOM,EOM等；熟悉计算机辅助设计软件和应用(Proe)了解制冷产品的技术知识；指导和帮助结构设计团队的设计人员提高技术支持的业务能力。
任职资格:
年龄要求：30-50岁
工作年限：6年以上工作经验，3年以上高级管理经验
性别要求：男女不限
语言要求：普通话、英语或日语听说读写流利

岗位职责:
1、参与产品项目立项可行性调研，参与系统方案设计；

任职资格:
1、熟练使用CATIA、Solidworks , 等CAD 3D建模软件；对工程结构有一定了解，能够渲染出精致的效果图；五年以上相关工作经验；擅长产品结构设计，造型设计能力强者优先；优秀应届毕业生亦可。

4、积极肯干，吃苦耐劳；具有创新精神及团队协作精神；
5、责任心强，有团队合作精神，有良好的沟通能力；

岗位职责:
1.根据本部门分解的目标制定仓库管理制度和工作计划,定期对本部门的工作进行总结和汇报.
2.明确下属的工作职责，对下属的工作进行分配，指导，负责对所属员工进行科学合理的绩效考评，并对下属的调配、任免、奖惩提供建议。
3.负责仓库整体工作失误及日常工作管理。协调部门与各职能部门之间的工作。
4.负责制定和修订仓储作业程序及管理制度，完善仓库管理的各项流程和标准。
5.负责分配仓管员和成品包装的日常工作。成品包装工作需要以效率为向导进行分配，并考核其完成情况。仓库保管员工作主要考核其卡、物是否一致以及配料及时性，监督其工作有效性，做到高效、准确、有序。
6.负责组织仓库盘点工作，确保卡、帐、物一致。
7.对仓库人员进行工作指导、业务知识培训。
8.负责监督处理不良品和呆滞料。
9.对仓库、收发区进行现场监督管理，5S的推行状况、目视化管理的执行状况。
10.仓库要合理化布局和管理，负责制定仓位的规划，标识，防火，防盗及物料的准确性管理标准。
11.根据销售出货计划安排成品或者配件发货。
12.选定物流承包单位，确保物流单位价格合理，运输周期符合公司要求。合理的降低物流费用。
其他部门领导的任务安排。
任职资格:
1.教育水平：大学或者以上学历；
2.专业：机械或者电气专业；
3.培训经历：有仓库管理培训经历尤佳
4.经验：2年以上仓库主管工作经历；
5.知识：具备生产管理最基本的管理能力
6.能力：具有创新能力、协调能力、沟通能力和执行能力；
7.态度：亲和自信、工作认真、严谨，开放的知识理念，团队协作，能承受压力；
技能技巧：熟悉PPT、word、excel等操作，了解金蝶K3操作。

职位名称: GMP验证工程师（暖通空调、制药工程)
岗位职责:
验证工程师（制药工程\暖通专业）2名
1、负责净化空调、制药工艺设备调试测试；
2、负责工艺、工艺设备、清洗验证方案编写、验证实施和验证报告的编写； 
3、负责验证主计划、风险评估、GMP审核方案的编写、工作的实施； 
4、负责验证sop的编写、测试文件库的建立
任职资格:
验证工程师（制药工程、暖通）
1、男，本科有工作经验（应届毕业生）； 
2、分析、制药、生物、暖通等相关专业本科学历； 
3、计算机操作能力强，能熟练使用办公自动化软件； 
4、英语听说读写熟练； 
5、责任心强，沟通能力强； 
6、有生物制药行业质量管理经验者优先考虑； 
7、能适应出差；

职位名称: 质量研究专员 / 主管
岗位职责:
1、完成所分配的分析方法研究工作，确保研究工作符合各项SOP的规定
2、负责产品转移中的质量研究，确保质量研究活动符合各项法规的要求，起草相关注册文件
3、负责产品维护中的质量研究工作：原辅料筛选、稳定性方案和报告以及质量研究报告
4、负责新原辅料的质量标准建立及相关质量研究
5、负责或参与所分配的特定质量研究工作
6、负责出口注册中的质量研究
7、提供必要的技术支持
任职资格:
1. 药物分析或化学分析专业，硕士以上学历。
2. 1年以上质量研究相关工作经验。
3. 熟悉新药研制、注册申请各法规，GMP
4. 良好的英语沟通、表达能力
5. 良好的团队协作、分析与解决问题的能力

岗位职责:
1. 为工厂提供快速的专业技术支持
2. 针对进口注册，为注册部提供快速的专业技术支持 
3. 针对需求，负责建立检验方法，包括：
a) 方法的开发与验证，以及分析方法向工厂的转移
b) 负责起草方法验证或方法转移方案与报告
c) 负责解决方法转移过程中的问题
4. 作为分析方法专家，参与杂质研究、相容性研究等研究工作                                                             5.密切关注中国药典与药品审评中心的最新动态，评估产品的潜在风险并快速反应
6. 负责所管辖仪器的日常维护、保养与维修
任职资格:
1、本科以上学历；
2、药物分析或化学分析专业；
3、熟练的英文表达能力；
4、本科5年以上分析工作经验，硕士3年以上分析工作经验，博士1年以上分析工作经验。熟练使用HPLC、GC、LC-MS、AAS等仪器。

1、良好的团队合作精神、良好的观察和分析能力、良好的沟通能力、良好的问题解决能力，有强烈的求知欲，帮助推动持续的改善。
2、7年以上品质工程师经历。
3、熟悉ISO9001的要求和实施方法。
4、英语口语熟练。
任职资格:
1、保证公司提供的产品和服务满足或超过客户的期待。
2、负责在全公司范围内品质保证各项目的实施。
3、负责同公司各部门紧密合作，帮助各部门理解品质项目在各领域的影响，并推动项目的进度。
4、主导供应商纠正措施的实施和推进，并对纠正措施进行后续监察，以确认纠正措施的有效性。
5、与营业部门和技术部门紧密合作，确保新产品及其生产工序能够满足客户需求，保证产品和工序在量产前做好全面的量产准备。
6、带领品质技术人员测试、测量产品，并能够分析数据，提供分析报告，记录所有品质评价的结果。
7、在设计、开发和执行阶段，解决可能发生的问题。

职位名称: R&D Designer 研发设计工程师
岗位职责:
- PILOTE: Design and develop mechanical parts in accordance with customer specifications and Valeo technical standards.
- PILOTE: During the different phases of a project, make stake-up analyze (phases 1 and 2) and compare dimensions of real parts with drawings and tolerances defined in the dimension chains.
- PILOTE: To perform his/her activities, he/she:
·use U-Shin tools (CATIA, PLM, Qchecker…)
·applies U-Shin process (CIP, change management 4M, Product Data Management procedure, SPPC, PDCA, FTA…)
- PILOTE: The outputs of his work must respect U-Shin design standard procedures and quality standards (Qchecker for CAD models and drawings).
- PILOTE: As project contributor, he must respect the time schedule given by Product Engineer of projects.
- CONTRIBUTE: as a contributor of the project, he must participate to the:
·Design reviews of the project
·DFMEA 
·PFMEA to support Process contributors
- CONTRIBUTE: Apply the PLM rules regarding the management the inputs and outputs for his project.
·Justification design file on PLM ( 2D, 3D, Stack-up )
·Maintenance master data on PLM
- CONTRIBUTE: Analyze of product failures according to U-Shin procedure (5W2H, PDCA, FTA, LLC…)
·Warranty parts
·End of line rejects
·Tests failures
- CONTRIBUTE: Contribute to the continuous improvement of the department by making and realizing improvement proposals.
- PILOTE: Control that the Environmental rules are applied, specifically relating to the dangerous substances, saving energy & materials, protection of environment.
任职资格:
-Bachelor degree majored in Mechanical Engineering.
-2+ years’ professional experience in R&D of technical parts. Automotive industry is preferred.
-Good English skills (CET-4).
-Good PC skills and Software practice on CatiaV5, AutoCAD, etc.
