职位分类: 安全/健康/环境经理/主管
岗位职责:
Responsible for planning, coordinating and implementing an organization safety, health, security and housekeeping program to ensure a safe, healthy, and accident-free work environment.

1.	Plans and implements safety, health, sceurity and housekeeping policies and procedures in compliance with local Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) rules and other regulations.
2.	Plans and implements programs to train managers and employees in work site safety practices, fire prevention, and correct handling techniques for all chemicals, toxins, equipment, and other materials. 
3.	Prepares studies and analysis of industrial accident causes and hazards to health for use by company personnel and outside agencies.
4.	Inspects organization facilities to detect existing or potential accident and health hazards, determines corrective or preventive measures where indicated, and follows up to ensure measures have been implemented.
5.	Provides information, signs, posters, barriers, and other materials to warn of potential and actual safety hazards and to prevent access to hazardous conditions. 
6.	Leads the investigation of accidents and injuries and cooperates in the preparation of material and evidence for organization use in hearings, lawsuits, and insurance investigations.
7.	Complies and submits accident reports required by regulatory agencies.
8.	Prepares and arranges safety exhibits and material for display, promotional work, industry conferences and exhibitions.
9.	Represents the organization in community or industry safety group and programs. 
10.	Maintains safety files and records. 
11.	Support environmental duties/ compliance
12.	Industrial Hygiene (Noise & Air Quality)
13.	ER Team/Safety Committee
14.	Regular housekeeping audit, report, follow-up and improvement.
任职资格:
1.	Bachelor’s degree in occupational Safety and Hygiene Management or equivalent.
2.	Minimum of 5 years experience as a Manager of Safety and Health.
3.	First Aid/CPR Certified.

岗位职责:
1. 协助主管抓好工厂安全生产和治保工作，确保安全生产正常进行。 
2. 检查工厂现场安全和职工行为规范，确保工厂安全工作的落实。正确处理各类应急事件和异常情况，按应急预案及相关安全管理规定执行。 
3. 能熟练掌握和运用相关法律法规。                                        
4. 做好生产现场危化品、易制毒和剧毒品的安全管理。
5. 熟练使用工厂电视监控系统及安全设施的评估报告。
6. 负责外来施工人员安全管理培训和教学，检查并做好相关记录。
7. 配合厂务做好节能减排和排放达标工作。
8. 做好EHS体系工作。
任职资格:
1、了解TS16949/ISO9001质量管理体系、QC080000、有害物质清单，相关程序文件，安全生产法，半导体产品生产流程知识。
2、掌握EHSMS环境及职业健康安全管理体系，相关规章制度，
3、掌握动力源运行专业知识，化学试剂的专业知识(相关工序)，熟练掌握消防、安全器材的使用 
4、3年以上半导体生产工作
5、有注册安全工程师、建构筑物消防员证优先、EHS内审证、安全管理员证优先

岗位职责:
•	Audit, evaluation and monitoring the production processes of suppliers, assuring that the products supplied  meets the quality expectations. 
•	Coordinate with suppliers quality goals, implementation time and make sure they are achieved. 
•	Ensures that the suppliers have the productivity capacity, Process quality. 
•	Check the conformity of a product provided with the quality standards, national and international reference norms. 
•	Manage the suppliers non-conformities and their action plan. 
•	Manage the Supply Chain Ranking of  "Top 5 Worst Suppliers" 
•	Apply to worst suppliers the Delivery Control procedures. 
•	Manager the quality documentation of suppliers. 
•	Coordinates the test samples regarding Process Approval. 
•	Handles non conformity suppliers in Quality System, from the analysis of non-conformity to the corrective action and their efficiency. 
•	Performs audits at suppliers, where necessary and / or second terms defined. 
•	Plan verification of  corrective actions to closure of non-conformity, checking the results and informing the quality system. 
•	Follows the development plan of the Supplier and identifies any training needs related to the quality of a product/process. 
•	Performs Quality audits and assures that the supplier follows the action plan, which comes from the audits. 
•	Collaborate with the company management to verification, control of application of procedures, training as active part of suggestions for their improvement in terms of efficiency.

Production quality (all tasks for mass production):

岗位职责:
1.建立、健全财务管理体系，对财务部门的日常管理、年度预算、资金运作等进行总体控制；
2.负责财务报表及财务预决算的编制工作；
3.负责监督检查财务制度、预算的执行情况以及适当及时的调整；
4. 公司账务核算、财务内部审计、辅助台账管理；

6.监督执行财务计划，完成公司财务目标；
7.完成领导交待的其他工作事项。
任职资格:
1.性别不限（女性 已婚已育优先）；
2.全日制本科毕业（含以上）  会计、审计专业；
3. 3年以上财务工作管理经历；
4. 熟练操作财务软件；
5.工作严谨、认真仔细、务实、高效，责任心强；

岗位职责:
1、日常财务核算、会计凭证、出纳、税务工作的审核；

6、孰知商业税务制度，精通财务软件，熟练操作电脑；

岗位职责:

岗位职责:
1.从监控管理的角度，从销售人员和客户端收集销售数据，进行分析，定期出具各类书面报告，给公司管理层做参考并需要定期口头汇报 
2.负责销售forcast的定期汇总更新，确保及时准确发布，对差异等特殊情况查找原因并及时对内部反馈 
3.负责统筹管理销售订单，关键客户订单内部跟踪管理，协调以确保准确、及时发货 
4.负责就订单事宜与客户进行沟通协调，统筹规划 
5.管理第三方库存并协调销售对第三方库存数量进行监控
6.负责客户信用额度管理，定期与客户对账，根据公司要求准确、及时开票，确保客户根据合同要求进行付款，对于任何差异及时处理并对内反馈 
7.进行客户满意度调查，协助销售提高客户满意度
8.负责订单管理系统的维护与管理 
9.销售合同和相关文件的管理
10.负责产品的销售报价单的制作，以及相关数据库的维护

12.协助部门经理安排的其它工作

3.熟练使用办公室软件     
4.独立性工作能力强，良好的协调及沟通能力，诚实，工作努力并且有耐心
5.有良好的团队合作精神
6.工作作风细致注意细节
7.能够解决工作冲突，营造双赢的情形

职位名称: 日语客服组长/ Customer Service (Team Leader)
岗位职责:
Responsibilities:
Assign, coordinate and monitor the activities of the Customer Service departments' staff and ensure that the established Quality and Productivity standards are met, as well as training the staff and lend support in administrative personnel management. Write up individual productivity reports as well as quality and applied time reports.

-Ensure smooth execution of Order to Cash (OTC) Via Oracle
Ensure Product and Service Complaints are monitored and tracked
Ensure error rate are kept within our established acceptable range

-Responsible for training all new Customer Service Employees
1) System (Oracle) training (Order to Cash OTC, Service Request (SR), I-Exp etc.)
2) System access set up
3) ID set up etc

- Assist the immediate supervisor in the administrative management of the department's staff (leave of absence, vacation, overtime, career paths, etc.)

- Draft the department's daily Productivity and Quality report and send to immediate supervisor and Corporate Management.
Draft individual productivity and quality reports for each member of the team and daily reports on hours spent capturing orders.
Carry out partial productivity cut off assessments twice a day in order to provide feedback to the team members regarding progress in obtaining goals.

-Follow up on issued orders that are not reserved, booked (Book) and/or issue orders on the system
任职资格:
Requirements:
- B.S. degree, with the commands of the Japanese & English languages, JLPT-2 or above, CET-4 or above.
- 1 to 2 years in similar positions that include coordinating work teams (10 to 15 persons).
- Coordinate the activities of the Customer Service team and provide constant follow up on accomplishment of all goals, as well as planning time productively.
- Guide, direct and motivate the work team to achieve the targeted metrics in a coordinated manner.
- Not accomplishing goals and omissions when attending to clients may affect the level of satisfaction expressed by clients.
- In charge of a team about 10 persons with college degrees.

您是否拥有流利的韩语口语与阅读能力？


请回答下面的问题：

· Ability to multi-task

1. Successfully manage the Project Axle programs to 90 days post start of production (SOP) using the customer’s planning and program management techniques in conjunction with the Program Management APQP-based process.

3. Meet all design, quality, production, financial, and milestone timing needs of the Program.
4. Develop and maintain project timing charts. 
5. Plan, lead & conduct timely team meetings and program status reviews. Communicate or present project status as needed through reports and program management reviews at all levels. 
6. Identify and resolve project issues, using root cause analysis and provide a robust process for change management. Ensure a change control and corrective action process is in place that aligns with the customer’s systems.
7. Publish a “Lessons Learned” document at conclusion of program. (i.e. 90 days post SOP.)
8. Maintain the project schedule as agreed between the customer and Dana.
9. Liaison with customer regarding program issues, including participation in customer meetings.
10. Monitor project concept, budget & schedule for compliance with customer specifications.
11. Provide oversight and guidance for customer communication channels for significant program information & data.
12. Plan and identify required staffing needs to the appropriate function in a timely manner.  Coordinate the activities of all cross-functional team members. Mediate and resolve project team conflicts, while maintaining team structure and supporting the authority of each team member.  
13. Plan, chose, & manage (to 90 days post SOP) the establishment of production lines. Transfer new production lines to local plant management and collaborate with production personnel to maximize utilization of resources.
14. Ensure successful design, capability, installation and prove-out of production equipment and tools.
15. Ensure procurement of capital equipment for program & ensure compliance with all required codes.
16. Manage and control the planning and implementation of SOP Plans for all functional disciplines. 
17. Establish targets for price, warranty and delivery issues with critical outside suppliers and support Purchasing or Quality in negotiations with suppliers as appropriate.
18. Optimize project cash flow through timely coordination of all purchase order releases.
19. Ensure Dana supplier quality and technical (SQA & STA) systems are in place using documented processes.
20. Plan and manage all budgets and costs associated with the Program, and adhere to the Program Pro Forma.
21. Develop and implement control procedures to manage capital, tooling, start-up, engineering, and project expenses.
22. Functional support plant General Manager for broad issues.

5、根据项目时间要求完成项目上所有设计图纸的校核、出图和项目上使用材料的选择、确认工作。    
6、按照规范设计要求组织编制设计图纸、材料样板、施工图纸、验收图纸、资料（法律文件），并进行校核，上交领导审核后，交由专员归档；    
7、负责项目中的设计变更、技术支持等工作    
8、有效整合团队，组织协调分工，增强团队凝聚力和战斗力，更好地发挥每个设计师的设计水平，从而为公司创造更大的效益。    
9、负责对本部门组员进行定期技能培训，并且协调组员之间工作上的问题,充分调动组员专业方面的最大创意能力及创意效率。    
10、研究、了解和跟踪国内外同类在设计方面的发展趋势；能独立果断地判断出概念设计方案并能遵循大市场定位、国际时尚风格走向等；同时负责与客户进行沟通，精准地向客户阐述出设计理念，并让客户信服。    
11、根据设计部实际情况、结合公司总体规章制度，加以修改或制定合理、有效、深入的工作管理细则；同时要定期组织本部门成员学习公司的各项规章制度。
任职资格:
1、年龄30~45岁，全日制本科及以上学历；专业优异者可放宽至大专学历；     
2、机械设计、自动化控制或相关专业；     
3、非标自动化设备设计6年以上工作经验，设计能力出众。本行业管理工作经验3年以上者优先；     
4、熟悉电动、气动、液压的应用选型，会结构受力选型；     
5、熟练使用AutoCAD、Solidworks等绘图工具，绘制满足机械外加工用的立体和平面图；     
6、熟悉各种加工工艺，钣金，热处理，表面处理等；    
7、可阅读专业的英语技术资料，具备一定的英文写作能力和口语交流能力；     
8、有良好的职业道德和团队协作精神，抗压性强，能适应国内外短期出差。    
9、有独立设计自动化设备，20个动作以上设备，5台以上的实际设计经验。

岗位职责:
Key Accountabilities:
- Engineering lead of assigned customer programs.
- Develop value proposition for potential customer requirements.
- Provide application solution to customers, meet their engine requirements.
- Provide technical support to customer, solve their technical problems.
- Regular technical presentation and training to OE costumers.
- Run RFQ process internally, and provide costing to Sales include best technical approach and best solutions to customers.
- Manage sales projects with respect to technical issues by coordinating and working with Customers, OE Sales, Engineering team, and operation team until SOP.
- Responsible for OE customer input and requirements.
- Responsible for technical and product proposal.
- Responsible for OE customer complaint about product and technical issues.
- Establish good relationship with customers.
- Regular customer visit and business trip are necessary for this role.
任职资格:
Education Qualification:
- Bachelor of Mechanical/Material Engineering, Automotive, Engine.Master would be a plus.

Technical Competence & Skills:
- Customer focus
- Functional/ technical skills
- Decision quality
- Problem solving
- Learning on the fly
- Dealing with ambiguity
- Listening
- Informing
- Priority setting

Leadership Competence:
- Self-assurance, good leadership and communications skills

Relevant Experience:
- 5+ years work experience.
- 3+ years work experience in development of products or similar position/area.
- Experience in working with international teams
- Ability to work well in at team and experience with project management.

岗位职责:
Job Purpose:

•	The target is to achieve project turn over targets.
•	实现公司项目销售的指标。
•	Provide professional solution and service for customer.
•	为客户提供专业的解决方案和服务。
•	Increase engineering competence in specific industry area and product.
•	提升相关行业及产品的技术竞争力。

Key performance areas: 
•	Provide machining solution for workpiece from customer.
•	为客户的工件提供完整的解决方案。
•	Understanding customer needs, prepare machining process and time study and tool list.
•	理解客户需求，提供加工工艺，节拍计算及刀具清单。
•	Design tools in projects.
•	设计项目中的刀具。
•	Make quotation for tools and solution, visit customer and discuss solution.
•	为项目解决方案提供报价，拜访客户并讨论方案。
•	Hold project start meeting to ensure all technical data is clear and prepare documents for order.
•	召开项目启动会议，确保技术细节已确认，准备订单文件。
•	Follow through projects status, acceptance and optimize.
•	跟踪项目状态，现场验收和优化。
•	Prepare success story for projects and share.
•	准备成功项目案例及分享。

Contact information: 
Read more about Walter and apply at www.walter-tools.com/Career, Job ID: 347374
任职资格:
Your profile: 
•	University or College degree in mechanical engineering.
•	机械专业大学以上学位。
•	At least 2 years’ experience in mechanical industry.
•	机械行业3年以上相关工作经验。
•	Familiar with machining process, such as turning, milling, drilling, tapping, boring, reaming, etc....
•	熟悉机械加工工艺，例如车，铣，钻，攻丝，镗，铰等。
•	Good knowledge of CNC machine tool.
•	具有良好的数控机床知识。
•	Knowledge of metal cutting theory.
•	具有金属切削的理论知识。
•	Can be use English as working language.
•	能使用英语进行工作沟通。
•	Be able to handle work pressure.
•	能处理工作上的压力。
•	Be able to travel.
•	能适应工作上的出差。

As a person you are proactive, self-motivated and one with lot of initiative, courage and integrity and a business minded, result oriented attitude. You also have strong communication skills and can work in an English environment.
项目管理专业或者机械专业毕业，必须有PMP证书，懂机械的优先

岗位职责:
1.Ensure the technical, quality, process and material transfer efficiently.
2.Ensure the production of France order run smoothly in DDW plant and ensure on schedule delivery.
3.Keep communication with DDZ and coordination of related issues within DDW.
4.Sourcing for production and non-production material supplier for France HQ orders.

2.Corresponding experience in mechanical industry.
3.Bachelor degree majoring in mechanical, engineering etc.
4.High responsibilities and team spirit.

6.Familiar with chemical equipment is preferred.

职位名称: 客户服务代表（韩语）Customer Service Rep.(Korean)
岗位职责:
您是否拥有流利的韩语口语与阅读能力？


请回答下面的问题：
1. 您是否可以接受每天从上午8点工作到下午5点（周一至周五）？
2. 您是否愿意按照韩国的公共假期进行工作和休假？


如果您对以上两个问题的答案都是“是”的话，那么我们欢迎您加入我们的泛达客户服务团队，成为我们的客户服务代表。


我们希望您：
- 是一个工作态度良好，有较强的沟通能力和团队合作意识的人；
- 在订单管理上能够实现客户满意度目标；
- 能够及时回复所有收到的订单；
- 能够可靠并准确地输入订单数据；
- 最好能了解Oracle相关知识—特别是Order to Cash
- 流利的韩语及英语能力—包括书面和口语；
- 1年以上相关工作经验。


泛达作为一个美国独资公司，将为您提供：
- 有竞争力的薪水和良好的福利待遇；
- 一个充满活力的US MNC销售和营销的工作环境和令人兴奋的职业；
- 在亚太地区从事业务的宝贵经验。



我们希望早日见到您！
任职资格:
Responsibilities:

· Responsible for data entry into Oracle system
· Attend to Customer Services enquiries
· Maintain logs/records
· Ad-hoc duties assigned


Requirements:

· Minimum Diploma in any discipline
· Minimum 1 years' relevant working experience
· Must be proficient in Outlook, Word and Excel
· Ability to focus on data entry and accuracy
· Detail and number oriented
· Ability to multi-task
· Fluent in written & spoken English/Korean language
· Strong analytical and organizational skills
· Confidence and maturity to properly manage his or her time
· Possess initiative and able to work under pressure

- 有竞争力的薪水和良好的福利待遇；

岗位职责：
主要职责：
通过传真，电子邮件或电话负责处理客户的要求，包括初步接触和回应，随访和决议。

岗位职责:
Job Purpose:
We are seeking a reliable and highly ambitious Outside Sales/Business Development Representative to sell a variety of highly technical specialized solutions to new and existing customers in an industrial commercial setting.  In this role, the incumbent will focus on prospecting, business development and building long term partnerships with potential and existing Chinese and other international customers through networking and cold calling for assigned sales territories in the chemical, pharmaceutical, steel, fertilizer, and petrochemical industries. Extensive travel will be required.

Duties:
1. Drive new strategic account development and sales through targeted prospecting, lead qualification, and visiting prospective customers.   Engage with customers through face-to-face visits, calls and e-mails to fully understand technical and commercial needs and align expectations between customers and company.
2. Identify potential customers that are consistent with the company’s market and business objective and establish strong relationships with key decision makers necessary to develop future business.
3. Further develop and strengthen relationships with existing customers through presentations, meetings, phone calls, and networking. Solidify relationships with the key decision-maker on qualified accounts through research and personal contacts.
4. Develop revenue growth strategies for new/existing customers, new/existing market penetration, new/existing geography, new/existing channel.  Achieve assigned revenue forecasts.
5. Utilize broad product and customer knowledge, as well as a thorough familiarity with market demands and conditions such as design features needed by customers, channels of distribution and the appropriate time and way to pursue growth in the market.
6. Quickly achieve aggressive sales targets in conjunction with the company’s business objectives.
7. Negotiate favorable terms with customers consistent with company requirements.
任职资格:
Skills/Qualifications:
1. Familiarity with developing new markets in both the chemical, pharmaceutical, steel, fertilizer, and petrochemical industries.
2. Proven track record of meeting and exceeding established sales targets.
3. Proven experience selling to all levels of positions within an organization from buyers to C-level executives.

Skills Education Required:
1. Bachelor’s degree in Chemical, Mechanical Engineering or related degree.
2. Minimum of 3-5 years sales and marketing, product line management or business development experience.
3. Experience in marketing and sales disciplines along with a capacity for creative and analytical thinking in a broad area is essential.
4. Experience selling to maintenance and repair departments in the chemical industry preferred.

职位名称: Order Manager (Master Planning) 订单经理
岗位职责:
About us
We are the largest Austrian EMS Electronics Manufacturing Service provider, headquartered in Vienna and production sites in Austria and Hungary. MELECS produces electronic components for customers in the automotive, lighting, communication & industry as well as white goods sector. As our  business is rapidly expanding in the Chinese market, we’re going to open a factory in Wuxi/China in 2016 to produce and sell electronic components in the Asian market.
Currently we’re building up our new China organization and are recruiting the first key positions. In order to form a strong management team of its Electronics Factory in Wuxi, we are looking for an Order Manager. The position is located in Jiangsu Province, Wuxi (无锡), Huishan District (惠山区).
For this position, we will send to Austria for a period of 3-4 months technical training in order to obtain the knowhow.

Position description:
Reporting Line to: Supply Chain Manager
Responsibilities:
·        Master data maintenance, parameter settings and changes in SAP/R3
·        Material Planning, Demand tasks according to the agreed customer requirements and considering the delivery time of parts and optimized stock level
·        Creation of manufacturing orders
·        Material tracking, Optimization of lead times and inventory
·        Schedule tracking and on-time delivery to customers
·        Intensive cooperation with customers regarding demand planning and supplies
·        Interface management to the areas product management, warehouse, purchase, production, dispatchers and customer
·        Creating the dispatch advice for transport organization and information for the customer
·        Cooperation in project teams for new products and coordination for product launch and outlet
任职资格:
Requirements:
-           Commercial education (business fundamentals), logistics processes and technical basic education (electrical and EMS production techniques advantageous)
-           At least 5 years of relevant working experience in international company
-           Languages: Chinese and very good English knowledge
-           Very good computer skills (MS Office)
-           Experience in application with SAP/R3 is advantageous
-           High customer orientation
-           Skills for communication, organization and teamwork

We are the largest Austrian EMS Electronics Manufacturing Service provider, headquartered in Vienna and production sites in Austria and Hungary. MELECS produces electronic components for customers in the automotive, lighting, communication & industry as well as white goods sector. As our  business is rapidly expanding in the Chinese market, we’re going to open a factory in Wuxi/China in 2016 to produce and sell electronic components in the Asian market.
Currently we’re building up our new China organization and are recruiting the first key positions. In order to form a strong management team of its Electronics Factory in Wuxi, we are looking for an IT Engineer. The position is located in Jiangsu Province, Wuxi (无锡),  Huishan District (惠山区).
For this position, we will send to Austria for a period of 3-4 months technical training in order to obtain the knowhow.

About us
We are the largest Austrian EMS Electronics Manufacturing Service provider, headquartered in Vienna and production sites in Austria and Hungary. MELECS produces electronic components for customers in the automotive, lighting, communication & industry as well as white goods sector. As our  business is rapidly expanding in the Chinese market, we’re going to open a factory in Wuxi/China in 2016 to produce and sell electronic components in the Asian market.
Currently we’re building up our new China organization and are recruiting the first key positions. In order to form a strong management team of its Electronics Factory in Wuxi, we are looking for an Supply Chain Manager. The position is located in Jiangsu Province, Wuxi (无锡), Huishan District (惠山区).
For this position, we will send to Austria for a period of 3-4 months technical training in order to obtain the knowhow.

Position description:
Reporting Line to: General Manager
Responsibilities:
·        Leading a logistic-department with 10 to 12 people, who is responsible for:
1.     operational purchasing for electronic parts,
2.     incoming area with material check -  identification and quantity, material booking
3.     warehouse of parts and internal material-logistics,  material for the production-lines
4.     warehouse of finished goods and outgoing goods including operational transport organization
5.     order management, operational contact to customer to fulfill customer demands
6.     Planning and scheduling of production orders on production line level
·        Main part is the disciplinary management of the staff. This includes also competence development and performance improvement based on KPI`s. A special part will be the training of the persons. In the warehouse area the material will be handled with forklifts and the material-booking will be done with computer and remote-scanner .
·        Continuous improvement of logistic processes in order to increase quality level, productivity, reliability and decrease downtimes.
·        Ensuring the material availability for the production according the customer demands
·        Material-planning according to customers forecast and production capacity availability, making production orders to fulfill customer demands and defined safety stock, delivery-notes for shipments in time to customer
·        Production-orders will be planned on each production line according to their capacity and to achieve the defined deadline of each production order. Therefore the actual status of the production orders will be continuously controlled.
·        Packing the finish goods ready for shipment, prepare the paperwork and organizing transport according to the requirements of the order manager
·        In the start up phase the main focus is on the competence build up in the logistic department by taking over the processes and standards from the Austrian factory.
任职资格:
Requirements:
·        Bachelor degree or above degree, in electronics or mechanical engineering
·        Approx.8 years management experience in a multinational corporation in China
·        Organizing ability
·        Advanced Knowledge and practical experience with logistic in-house processes  
·        Basic understanding of Software and IT systems
·        Strong intercultural and communication skills
·        Leadership and team building competences
·        Chinese native speaker with excellent command of both oral and written English
·        Down-to-earth attitude with pioneering spirit

1.Prepare the sales contracts for BWF’s domestic sales business
为必达福国内销售业务准备销售合同
a)work-out and issue standard sales-contracts (as requested by the members of BWF’s salesteam) 制定并发布必达福标准销售合同（应必达福销售团队的要求）
b)Review, adjust and chop sales-contracts provided by customers of BWF. 审查，调整必达福客户提供的销售合同并敲章。
2.Guarantee that all sales contracts are in line with BWF’s legal standards and requirements. These requirements are defined by BWF’s sales director and GM and concern: 保证所有的销售合同符合必达福的法律标准和要求。这些要求由必达福的销售总监和总经理定义：
a) Check for key-parameters检查关键参数
The following key-parameters have to appear on the contract and have to be both plausible and acceptable以下关键参数必须合理并且可接受地出现在合同里：:
- bag diameter (clear description / drawing in case of non
  standard products)    - 滤袋直径（清晰的描述/绘图以防非标准产品）
- cell plate dimension花板尺寸
- TAN (need to be part of all sales contracts / has to be in line with the product designation, mentioned on the contract必须是所有销售合同的一部分/必须符合合同上提到的 产品名称)
- Technical Datasheet (need to be part of all sales contracts) 技术数据表（必须是所有销售合同的一部分）
- request for a sample cage / timely confirmation of BWF’s sample bag in case of sales of special products such as bags made from PTFE or glass membrane要求提供笼骨样品/在销售特殊产品如PTFE或玻纤覆膜制成的滤袋时及时确认BWF的滤袋样品
 b) Payment terms付款方式
to be in line with the terms, authorized for the individual customer符合授权给单个客户的条款
c) Delivery time交货时间
d) Warranty Document / Warranty Conditions担保文件/保修条件
o be worked out together with the sales director / to be attached to all sales contracts that promises a specific service-life or dust emission与销售总监共同制定/将承诺的具体使用寿命或粉尘排放附加到所有销售合同中
e) AR-overdue逾期AR
if not approved by the superior, new contracts are only to be issued in cases where the customer has no old AR没有上级主管的同意，新合同只在客户没有旧的应付账款时才能发布
f) old bags on stock库存旧袋
if not approved by the superior, new contracts are only to be issued in cases where the customer has no old bags on stock 没有上级主管的同意，新合同只在客户没有库存旧袋时才能发布
g) Court of Jurisdiction法院管辖
3.Go through all contracts that don’t use the BWF-standard-contract and search for potential (legal) risks before chopping it.
Consult with the responsible salesman and find a reasonable way to resolve the problem. 检查所有非标合同，在敲章前找出合同中潜在的（法律）风险。 咨询相关销售员，并找到合理的方式来解决问题。
4.Inform Order Handling about time critical orders by hightlight relevant phrases on the contract (e.g. penalties for late delivery).用突出相关重点的短语通知订单处理部交货期紧急的订单（如: 逾期交货罚款）。

2.      More than 3 years of export sales experience in machinery field
3.      Good command in both written and oral Korean and English.
4.      Be able to travel.
5.      Good skills in reporting/communication/time management, as well as professional business ethics.

岗位职责:
1)	Evaluate Off-Highway Driveline product and customer needs to service the marketplace, including cooperator design benchmarking and perform design studies to present design options and packaging solutions including cost implications and developing an effective design proposal to meet the customer demands.
2)	Responsible for overseeing the Product engineering team to insure we are applying our product line to our customer’s vehicles and providing the technical support at our customer for our Sales Department. 
3)	Provide technical support to the customer, the manufacturing plants, the assembly plants, and the sales department during design phase, sourcing, vehicle development, launch, and throughout production.
4)	Communicate internal and customer needs and concerns throughout all levels of the organization both verbally and through various written texts and presentations. 
5)	Facilitate the product development of Off Highway product using the Dana process to ensure that procedures are followed, meetings focused, efficient and effective.
6)	Support the implementation of the Stage Gate / Design Review Process and various other internal processes
7)	Guide product teams to interpret and understand the new product development process correctly.
8)	Develop and implement a failure analysis process primarily for failures exposed in engineering qualification testing, manufacturing testing and customer applications.
9)	Ensure reliability program plans include product assurance engineering activities that are planned and executed according to schedule and satisfy all development requirements.
10)	Actively monitor field issues & warranty performance and lead problem-solving efforts for emerging warranty issues.
11)	Direct testing activities on components and assemblies under designated conditions to ensure product met design specifications.
12)	Assure processes are in place and maintained for efficient documentation and completion of work within product engineering.
任职资格:
1)	Six years minimum experience in engineering, manufacturing with a strong understanding of off highway axles.
2)	Project management experience and related customer program experience.
3)	Ability to successfully function in a matrix style of management & manage a variety of cross-functional teams.
4)	Strong organizational, team building, problem solving, planning, decision-making & interpersonal skills.
5)	Proficiency in written and oral communications; PC software; and presentation skills. 
6)	Must be fluent in English and Mandarin
7)	An understanding of financial analysis concepts and budget management.
8)	Must be willing to travel within China and Asia Pacific as needed and work non-normal business hours.
9)	Must be a self-directed and motivated individual who is willing to accept responsibility.
10)	Successful candidate will have knowledge of automotive quality standards including APQP, DVP&R, DOE, 8D,  PPAP, VE/VA, FMEA and auditing.

岗位职责:
You have an engineering background and are you looking for an active working environment? You believe there is always a better way and love innovation? We’re looking for a project engineer at Pan-Asia Gas Technology to be part of our core components team. 

As project engineer core components, you design new core components and deliver projects on time in full. You will play an active role in designing the future generation of oil-injected screw products.

You:
1.Contribute to the company’s mission of product leadership by designing & developing safe and reliable components with a First Time Right approach
2.Help to achieve the company’s mission of cost leadership through a cost conscious lean design and innovation for cost leading solutions
3.Work closely with Marketing, Sourcing, Production, Quality, and Aftermarket in order to deliver the projects on time in full.
4.Set up a time frame taking the available resources and priorities into consideration. Coordinate tasks to respect to the set planning.
5.Write functional specifications and define test program based on risk assessment
6.Closely get involved with prototype assembly and prototype tests in the lab
7.Play an active role in supplier visits and technical meetings with suppliers together with the Sourcing engineers in order to have components with the right quality at market-leading cost.
8.Visit customers to get a better customer understanding and follow-up endurance tests or quality issues.
9.Work according to a lessons learned approach and believe there is always a better way.
QUALIFICATIONS/EXPERIENCE: This includes but does not limit to age, gender, education, working experience, language,
Computer and personality.
任职资格:
Experience requirements
1. Minimum 3 years design experience in machine engineering
2. Experience with structural analysis, castings and drivetrains is a strong plus

 Knowledge / Educational requirements
1. University degree or similar through experience, major in mechanical engineering.
2. Good command of English and Mandarin (both oral and written)
3. Excellent design skills
4. Proficient software skills (Lotus Notes, MS Office) 
5. Being familiar with oil injection screw compressors is a plus

Personality requirements
1. Open minded
2. Strong interpersonal communication and collaboration
3. Being able to work independently 
4. Innovative and Result driven.
5. Customer oriented.

岗位职责:
1.0	DESCRIPTION:
•	This position will be based out of China but will report out to the Manufacturing Engineering Manager based out of Guelph, Ontario, Canada. The successful candidate will be responsible for working with existing and new suppliers to Skyjack that are developed, and being developed, within China and possibly other locations in Asia. The position will involve frequent travel and extended stays at supplier locations to support launches and develop supplier processes while working closely with the Supplier Development Engineer out of Wuxi Skyjack (Linamar). Fluent communication skills in English (both written and oral) is vital for this position as you will communicate frequently with the Product Development team in North America and will be the liaison between Skyjack and our supply base in Asia. The candidate will also be required to run meetings and conference calls between Skyjack and suppliers where you will be expected to translate communications from English to Chinese and from Chinese back to English and ensure clear communications and alignment. The successful candidate must be extremely self-motivated and be able to work independently and largely unsupervised yet still meet deadlines and expectations.

2.0	RESPONSIBILITIES:
•	Interface with the Product Development team (at Skyjack division in Canada) and vendors to define project scope, resolve technical issues and assist with preparation for launches
•	Accountable for developing plant control philosophy creating; Control Plans, PFMEA’s, VSM’s, work instructions, time studies, etc. at Skyjack suppliers in Asia 
•	Develop and support the welding process requirements for current and new Skyjack products at Skyjack suppliers in Asia
•	Development of standard operating procedures (work instructions) for all processes at Skyjack suppliers in Asia 
•	Responsible for all jigs and fixtures and inspection tools at suppliers to ensure parts are in compliance with specifications
•	Design and/or procure jigs, fixtures and tooling required for all products
•	Work with tooling suppliers to verify design and drawings to ensure accuracy and compliance with specifications
•	Develop innovative ideas and alternatives to be cost competitive with production targets
任职资格:
1.0	ACADEMIC / EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
•	A graduate of a Mechanical, Manufacturing, or Industrial Engineering program or equivalent work experience

2.0	REQUIRED SKILLS / EXPERIENCE:
•	Knowledge of CWB (Canadian Welding Bureau) and/or AWS (American Welding Society) standards is an asset
•	Strong knowledge of jig and fixture design and work holding principles
•	Experienced weld fixture and tooling designer (minimum 5 years)
•	Good understanding of LEAN techniques, work flow and cell layout
•	Must have good communication skills (both written and oral in English and Chinese) and be able to work closely and effectively with other departments and individuals within the organization
•	A team player with a positive attitude towards new concepts and innovations
•	Self-motivated, organized and have attention to detail
•	Able to work independently, prioritize, and multi task with accountability for decisions
•	Above average computer skills including all Windows applications, AutoCAD and SolidWorks/ProE
•	5+ years’ experience in a welding environment, preferably multi component weldments with multi pass welds
•	Strong knowledge of weld sequencing, fit up and processes
•	Demonstrated problem solving skills 
•	Project management experience is an asset
•	Experience creating control plans, PFMEA’s and 8D’s an asset

•	Design and/or procure jigs, fixtures and tooling required for all products

2．	适应倒班工作(三班)；
3．	及时准确地做好各类保养和维护记录；
4．	准确无误地操作相关设备；
5．	针对设备存在的问题,提出改进方案并实施；
6．	评估设备情况,做出风险评估；制订备件计划并定购；
7．	辅助完成SOP及其他维修有关文件的制定.
任职资格:
1．	专业要求：机电一体化或自动化控制类专业本科及以上学历
2．	专业能力：
-	熟悉液压气动控制，具有设备机械调整改造经验；
-	熟悉设备自动化控制，具有自动化系统的故障诊断和维护经验，如西门子PLC、HIM；；
-	了解变频调速、伺服控制和温控仪表应用；
-	具备快速明晰的控制系统分析、故障判断和处理方案制定及实施能力；
-	具备风险预测、判别和控制能力。
3．	个人特质：为人正直、诚实，谦虚、勤奋好学、吃苦耐劳;工作积极主动，有高度责任感，乐于助人。
4．	交流能力：较好的口头和书面表达、汇总能力。
5．	英语能力：熟练阅读英语技术资料,具备一定英语口语交流和书面表达能力。
6．	其他：具备无菌设备维护经历者或设备机械改造经验丰富者优先考虑.

岗位职责:
1．	生产设备日常维修和预防性维护及停产维修.
2．	及时准确地做好维修和预防性维护的记录.
3．	准确无误地操作相关设备.
4．	针对设备存在的问题,提出改进方案并实施.
5．	评估设备情况,制订备件计划并定购.
6．	辅助完成SOP及验证文件的制定.
任职资格:
1．	机电一体化本科及以上学历，三年以上相关工作经验
2．	为人正直、诚实，谦虚谨慎、勤奋好学、吃苦耐劳，动手能力强
3．	有高度责任感和团队合作精神，乐于助人.
4．	能熟练阅读英语技术资料,具备一定英语口语和书写能力更佳.

岗位职责:
Main Responsibility:
1.	Inform the customer centers via ECB's about products improvements and actions to be taken.
2.	Provide technical training for the service people of the customer centers on Vacuum products.
3.	Make all service related communications to the customer centers (Shanghai, Middle-East, Asia) and Service Center (RDC) from Wuxi Product Company.
4.	Follow-up of all the ongoing activities with the Service department in Airpower. 
5.	Define service kits to improve serviceability on machines.
6.	Organize TCM (Technical Committee Meetings) in the product company with the involved departments in the division to discuss technical issues in the field and take the necessary actions.
7.	Analyze the warranty claims and cluster them (e.g. in terms of Frequently Asked Questions) in order to be able to anticipate and handle them proactively.
8.	Participate in the development of new products in Wuxi and give support regarding serviceability during the project.
任职资格:
Main Requirement:
1.	Bachelor degree or above, major in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering.
2.	At least 3 years working experience in a technical environment.
3.	Good general compressor knowledge is a must, knowledge of the Industrial Air Products an advantage.
4.	Good command of English both oral and written, as well as computer skills (MS office). 
5.	Strong technical background is required.
6.	Good communication skills and enough maturity to accompany Shanghai service people in visiting customers.
7.	Pro-active, customer oriented, by maintaining regular contacts with the customer centers and giving them accurate and unambiguous advice.
8.	As a real problem solver, you can deal with unexpected situations and implement a solution and you actively search for what caused this situation.
9.	Good analyzing skills, can evaluate data and information and structure and prioritize the tasks accordingly.
10.	Willing to travel as necessary.

职位名称: 资深TPM工程师 Sr. TPM Engineer
岗位职责:
1.	建立公司TPM标准
Define company TPM standards
2.	制定TPM推进计划并实施
Develop TPM deploy plan and implement
3.	提高设备运行时间
Raise equipment uptime 
4.	精通OEE、预防性维护、计划性维护
Be expert in OEE / predictive / planned maintenance activities
5.	KPI计算（如：OEE、MTBF和MTTR）
Standardize KPI calculation based on company principle (e.g. OEE, MTBF and MTTR)
6.	实施定期TPM审核，监控纠正措施
Conduct regular audit on TPM production checklist and maintenances checklist and monitoring corrective action
7.	培训TPM团队与生产团队人员
Train maintenance and production teams in TPM concepts/activities
任职资格:
1)	大学本科以上学历,机械类相关专业
Bachelor degree or above in Mechanical related major
2)	5年以上外资企业工作经验，3年以上TPM经验
At least 5 years working experience in big foreign enterprise and 3 years TPM experience
3)	英语优秀者优先
Good English is a plus

岗位职责:
The function is responsible for Equipment management, maintenance, repairing and calibraition. And continuously improve machine efficiency.
1. Establish operation instruction of machine.
2. Provide skill training regarding machine operation according different working position.
3. Establish equipment maintenance schedule and monitor actual implement status.
4. Purchase and manage spare parts, tools and daily consumed material.
5. Control spare part stock, record and statistic distribution of tools and consumed material.
6. Continuous improve machine efficiency and reduce machine down time
7. Repair and maintain machines and equipments.
8. Upgrade machine technology.
9. Establish machine preventive system via regular maintenance, daily check and malfunction diagnosis etc, and guarantee machine running very well.
任职资格:
1. Bachelor degree or above in manufacture and industry major
2. Successfully graduated from technical university
3. Basic electric/mechanical knowledge
4. More than 3 years work experience for machinery maintenance. 
5. English fluent spoken and written

职位名称: Tool Mechanical Engineer / 模具机械工程师
岗位职责:
1.Verify and interpret drawings and technical instructions and check for practicability.
确认技术图纸及相关说明，并验证其可靠性。

2.Rebuild and modify of sample and series tools.
负责样品及系列模具的修改及改造工作。

3.Produce of particular components. 
特殊零件的制造。

4.Carry out repairs and maintenance work on 1K and 2K injection moulds.
负责一种及两种原材料的注塑模具的维修及维护工作。

5.New construction and optimizing of 1K and 2K injection moulds.
负责一种及两种原材料的注塑模具的新建及优化工作。

6.Experience in operating machine tools (for example: turning, milling, grinding, erosion). 
熟悉车床、铣床、磨床、冲床等机器设备的调机工作。

7.Prepare & design the right tooling and fixture for production / maintenance.
为生产或维修准备及设计合适的模具。

8.Lead and direct cross-functional team in program execution.
在项目执行中领导并管理跨职能团队。

9.Identify and specify engineering requirements for new projects.
为新项目确定并编写技术要求。

10.Provide support to department manager in generating quotation for projects involving new tools or components. 
项目中涉及到新设备及零部件报价时，为部门经理提供帮助。

11.Track and monitor project progress to ensure project schedules and cost objectives are met .
跟踪及负责项目流程，确保项目及成本目标的完成。

12.Other tasks assigned by Production Manager.
完成生产经理安排的其他工作。
任职资格:
1.Minimum 3 years relevant experience in plastic injection mold making industry.
注塑行业3年以上类似工作经验。

2.Bachelor degree in Precision Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or Manufacturing Engineering. 
精密工程、机械工程或制造工程专业本科以上学历。

3.Able to write, read and converse in English or German and Mandarin.
良好的国语及英语（或德语）沟通能力。

4.Practical knowledge in tool design and manufacturing technology. 
在模具设计及制造工艺方面有一定的实践知识。

5.Able to analyze problems and find solutions independent.
能独立分析问题并解决问题。

6.Good knowledge of project management and molding process.
在项目管理及成型工艺方面有良好的专业知识。

1.男，45岁以下，电气自动化或机电一体化专业，211本科学历；

4.熟练掌握OMRON或三菱PLC程序编写的优先考虑；
5.掌握伺服电机、步进电机、工作原理及控制方法；

岗位职责:
1.安全管理体系（OHSAS、安全标准化）日常的维护运营；
2.文件资料的编制、修订和跟踪；
3.安全信息宣传及员工培训；
4.组织参与安全活动；
5.其他安全相关事务。
任职资格:
1.本科学历，安全或相关专业毕业；
2.一年以上工厂安全管理工作经验，熟悉企业安全、职业健康、消防、劳动防护等知识；
3.熟练操作办公软件，良好的文书编写能力；
4.良好的沟通表达能力和工作态度；
5.有简单的日语交流能力优先；

岗位职责:
1、根据国家安全卫生相关法律法规要求，协助构筑安全卫生管理体系，对应各职能机关的安全卫生检查。
2、安全标准化、安全评估、职业病评估等工作的推进。
3、贯彻上级有关安全生产的指示，制定相关规定并检查执行情况，交公司的劳动安全卫生工作在部门落实。
4、协助定期召集各部门安全员开展安全卫生会议，对存在的事故隐患落实整改措施，并建立安全卫生台帐。
5、负责制定落实各种安全卫生管理标准及防止事故的技术措施，制定安全卫生措施计划，并督促有关部门按期执行。
6、经常对员工实施各类安全卫生教育，协助有关部门做好新员工三级教育和特殊工种安全技术培训工作。
7、协助事故统计上报，参加各类事故的原因分析、处理、负责工伤申报及劳动能力鉴定工作。
8、经常进行现场检查，即时发现并解除安全隐患。
9、日语口语及书面翻译。
任职资格:
1、全日制院校安全工程、环境工程专业或有相关工作经验2年以上；

岗位职责:
Main Responsibilities:
•	Establishment, implementation, improvement, documentation, maintenance of Safety&health, Environment and Energy management system (Hereby called SHE) in line with internal and external requirements, e.g. OHSAS18001, AQ/T9006, ISO14001, ISO50001, and ensure effectiveness according to QSHE requirements, company policy and local laws & regulations.
•	Review current process/activities for further improvement, implement initiatives to meet local government/company requirements on SHE issues. Make improvement of SHE performance to achieve SHE targets.
•	Identify and collect new legislations that affect our business, develop procedures to ensure compliance.
•	Communicate, provide guidance and support with regard to corporate standards, relevant policies, guidelines, practices and information to relevant departments
•	Develop and implement SHE training program, tools and techniques to improve all staff SHE awareness and skill, promote safe behavior.
•	Conduct internal audit / onsite 6S inspections as per scheduled plan to ascertain and report the status of compliance. Coordinate external audits e.g. Third party audits, customer, vendor, government, etc. Follow up all corrective actions for internal audit and external audit
•	Organize SHE risk assessments and risk report, develop preventive measures.
•	Ensure reporting of incidents/accident in A&I database timely. Lead incident/accident investigation process and verify that corrective actions are well implemented. Collect A&I lesson learned from AC A&I database to share it with all employees.
•	Keep good contact with local government about SHE matters. Lead SHE assessment / government approval for new projects, Administer SHE regulatory compliance for new business.
•	Manage SHE contract with related suppliers together with NPP purchasing.
•	Data collection for sustainability reporting and government reporting. 
•	Prepare SHE reports, Member of SHE council meeting.
•	Responsible for publishing and maintaining SHE visual management.
任职资格:
Main Requirements:
1.	More than 8 years of working experience in multinational company, 3 years more work in EHS management role.
2.	Familiar with utility equipment (Electric power station, compressor, cooling system, fire-fighting system etc.) and special equipment (Crane, forklift, welding process, etc.)
3.	Have experience of setting up or maintenance OHSAS18001, AQ/T9006, ISO14001.
4.	Have ISO50001 energy management experience is a plus
5.	University degree or above, major in electrical, mechanical, Safety Management, Environment and related specialty.
6.	ISO14001/OHSAS18001 internal auditor certificate.
7.	Willing to learn in SHE technical and regulations. 
8.	National registered safety engineer is a plus
9.	Good communication skills, good teamwork, broad knowledge of industry control.
10.	Positive thinking, open-minded, work independently, and initiate solutions to challenge.
11.	Good English both oral and written.same command as computer skills.

职位名称: 中国区供应商质量工程师
岗位职责:
Development and maintenance of systems to survey, approve, communicate and monitor performance of suppliers of raw material, to ensure quality and delivery of material; To review and approve, along with quality personnel, supplier PPAP submissions; To develop and maintain systems to provide suppliers with feedback on quality and delivery problems; To assist in the communication of supplier quality and delivery performance between Quality, Engineering and Materials Control Departments; To work with those suppliers wishing to work towards their development of ISO registrations
1.1	Assist in the maintenance and improvement of the Supplier Performance Monitoring system
1.2	Assist Project Engineer to select suppliers and establish supplier sample submission requirements
1.3	Visit potential suppliers to evaluate suitability by using developed checklist criteria including QSA
1.4	Interface with suppliers of raw material to resolve chronic or acute quality or delivery problems
1.5	Address all internal supplier quality concerns through daily walk around using a developed walk around checklist
1.6	Coordinate and oversee all internal supplier related sorting activities after obtaining authorization from the supplier
1.7	Assist in issuing a monthly and /or quarterly supplier PPM report and communicate results to management, purchasing and individual suppliers
1.8	Assist in issuing defect reports to suppliers on an issue by issue basis
1.9	Receive and review, along with quality personnel, supplier PPAP submission, require documentation and approve or reject as required
1.10	Act as a resource person for training of related supplier personnel, development of PPAP documentation and systems development
1.11	Preparation of internal forms to track supplier defects
1.12	Visit suppliers to verify compliance with Approved Process Control plans
1.13	Investigation and resolution of specific problems for assigned projects/parts
1.14	Assist in requesting written corrective action from suppliers and follow up as needed to ensure their resolution
1.15	Act as backup for maintenance of the Supplier Corrective Action Log book
1.16	Participate in or organize meetings involving supplier issue
1.17	Conduct assessments or QSA on existing suppliers as required
1.18	Develop and monitor schedule to ensure suppliers of significant purchased parts submit an annual PPAP
1.19	Develop and maintain a schedule to track suppliers’ progress towards ISO/QS9000 registration
1.20	Issue reports to management when significant information or concerns arise
1.21	Communicate with third party sort/rework companies to arrange sorting activities as may be required under direction of the Materials Manager, Purchasing Agent, Quality Assurance Manager  or Supervisor
开发并维护原材料供应商管理体系（包括供应商调研、批准、沟通和监控供应商业绩表现和原材料的质量），以保证原材料的质量和及时交付；与质量人员一起审核并批准供应商的生产批准程序；开发并维护原材料供应商质量问题及交货问题的反馈体系；向质量、工程和材料部门提供原材料供应商的产品质量及交付质量的报告；与有意愿获得ISO体系证书的供应商一起工作，帮助获得认证。
1.1	协助供应商绩效监督系统的维护及改进
1.2	协助项目工程师选择供应商，建立供应商样品提交申请
1.3	访问潜在供应商，制定包括质量体系评定在内的标准评估清单
1.4	与原材料供应商一起解决长期/突发问题或交货问题
1.5	通过日常使用的检查表解决所有内部供应商的质量问题
1.6	供应商获得授权后，协调和监督所有的内部供应商
1.7	协助发布月度/季度供应商PPM报告，与管理层，采购部及个别供应商就结果进行沟通
1.8	根据具体问题，协助供应商完成缺陷报告
1.9	与质量人员一起接收、审核并根据要求批准或拒绝供应商提交的PPAP文件
1.10	培训供应商的相关员工，帮助他们提升PPAP文档系统的开发和发展
1.11	以内部形式跟踪供应商的缺陷
1.12	访问供应商，已验证其是否符合已被批准的工艺控制计划
1.13	调查并解决所负责项目/零件的具体问题

1.15	备份供应商的纠正措施以便日后维护
1.16	参加或组织涉及到供应商问题的会议
1.17	按要求或QSA评估现有供应商
1.18	制定并监控进度确保重要的原材料供应商每年提交PPAP文件
1.19	开发并监控供应商申请ISO/QS9000体系的进度
1.20	在发生重大问题或获知重要信息时向管理层汇报
1.21	在材料经理，采购人员，质量经理或主管的安排下组织第三方返工

岗位职责:
Key Accountabilities:

- Process PPAP submittals from suppliers in order to improve purchased part quality. Determine adequacy of overall submittal, appropriateness of components (e.g. PFMEA, Control Plans). 
- Work with suppliers, program managers, engineering to define and drive necessary improvements where needed. 
- Evaluate and provide leadership in the development of new/existing supplier quality systems and process/product control systems. 
- Work closely with sourcing team to monitor supplier progress in improving identified needs. 
- Work closely with Corporate and purchasing and Plant QA to identify and prioritize audit needs. 
- Maintain audit schedule, and issue regular reports to APAC SQM.
- Participate in regular Purchasing staff meetings in order to influence the development of effective supplier development and monitoring efforts. 
- Change management on supplier e.g. process change, design change. Location change. 
- Provide leadership in resolution of Supplier quality problems associated with purchased parts and materials. 
- Use SQAR via project definition of product critical characteristics and appropriate test and control measures to assure compliance to final product characteristics.

职位分类: 安全/健康/环境经理/主管
岗位职责:
Responsibilities:
-Conformity: To identify the possible non conformities in relation to the legal or other requirements (supported by all kind of audits or inspections), alert about them, and make sure the actions to correct them are implemented.  This concerns:
•All administrative licences and permits
•All local, regional, country regulations
•U-Shin Directives conformity and related consultant recommendations
•Machine conformities in relation with Norms.
-Risk Assessment: To organize and perform regular Risk Analysis and Assessment, define protection measures and make sure they are implemented. 
•Identification of the dangers and dangerous situations
•Evaluate the possible impacts or damages
•Define priorities of protections measures.
-Standards: In relation to the above risk assessment and to legal and other requirements, to establish general and operational procedures and rules with concerned people.
•Writing general procedures for the coherence of the EMS and SMS systems, in relation to the Group Directives.
•Writing adapted operational instructions (general for the site, specific for some activities).
•Make sure all workstations have got clear Safety Instructions, a swell as all places where chemicals are handled.
-Training and communication: To train everyone concerned about these rules, inform people about accidents/incident, communicate about EHS areas, by using all media supports and visual management.
•Make sure all people present on the site (including new comers, visitors, contractors…) are trained about Valeo Safety rules.
•Make sure all operators are systematically trained with Safety Instructions about their workstation.
•Make sure all residual risks are visible and instructions reminded (Pictograms…).
-QRQC: To make sure the QRQC tool is well used and is effective at all levels.
•To guaranty the Plant QRQC is properly analysed, corrective actions are implemented, particularly the improvement of Standards.
•To make sure the APU QRQC will be used to act on frequency of accidents and prevent serious ones.
•To push everyone to detect and report all deviations before dangerous event appears.
-Safety awareness: To make people aware about the dangers, promote the prevention approach, 
and develop a Safety Culture.
-Management Systems: To manage their EHS Systems. Particularly:
•Continuous conformity with ISO and/or OHSAS Norms
•Base on the priorities, to manage the PDCA
-Responsible for identifying the environment factors for own department and area.
-Responsible for setting up the job responsibility for relevant positions of environment.
-Other tasks should be assigned by Dept. Manager.
任职资格:
Experience:
-Bachelor degree in material sciences, mechanical or chemical.
-5+ years working experience as engineer in the engineering or related area of HSE.
-Good knowledge about Chinese regulations, codes and standards for HSE, preferably also knowledge about international codes.
-Fluent English in written and speaking.
-Good at office software.

岗位职责:
Job Description
职位描述
Responsibilities include creating, modifying, executing, and validating finite element models for automotive components and assemblies. The FEA engineer will determine all governing or embedded assumptions for the model in including geometry, properties, element selection, mesh density, boundary conditions, and whether to approach the FEM solution on a linear or non-linear basis. The position will also be responsible for model maintenance, database maintenance, and documentation.
负责汽车零部件有限元模型的建立，调整更新，实施，确认。FEW工程师需要定义所有接触或者嵌入式的数模的尺寸、属性、要素选择、网格密度、边界条件，以及是否具备开始FEM分析的条件（线性以及非线性基础）。该职位同时也要求数据调整，数据维护以及文档管理。

Responsibilities:
责任
•Perform structural analysis and provide design guidance for various components and subsystems
为各种汽车零部件执行结构分析以及提供设计指导
•Support development of unique test fixture for validation testing
验证测试时支持设计特殊的测试工装
•Support DVT test planning, test activities, and post test documentation
  支持开发验证测试的计划、实施以及相关测试结果归档
•Prepare, document, and present supporting analyses to customer organizations
准备文件并协助分析结果以便展示给客户。
•Prepare, document, and present analyses/test results at design reviews, technical review, as required
如设计交流会议、技术交流会需要，要准备相关测试、分析的文件给客户展示。
任职资格:
•	Bachelor in engineering or equivalent
•	学士学位
•	Master or Ph.D. in engineering or equivalent is considered a plus
•	工程学硕士或博士优先考虑
•	Familiar with CAD software, SolidWorks preferred
•	熟悉CAD软件（Solidworks优先考虑）
•	Experience in FEA software is a plus
•	有FEA软件使用经历优先考虑。

Main Responsibility:
-Deliver high qualitative services in the domain of noise and vibration
-Investigate experimentally and theoretically the noise and vibration behavior of machines: perform measurements, analyze and report results, make suggestions.
-Determination of: (i) the operational levels of noise and vibrations of machines according to ISO and in-house experience (ii) structure dynamics analysis by tools as Operational Deflection Shapes, mode analysis…
-Distribute your knowledge on noise and vibration within the Wuxi organization allowing project teams to design first time right, regarding noise and vibration matters.
-Continuously strive for improvement of your services (quality, content, efficiency…) according to the needs of the Wuxi organization.
-Continuous and strong interaction with the noise and vibration team at Atlas Copco Airpower Antwerp.
-Keep track of legislation on noise emission and vibrations of machines.
-Continuously work on your knowledge in your domain.

Being a N&V engineer, it will be your mission to define solutions for problems regarding noise and vibration with which the project teams are faced. 
In order to be able to do your investigations, you will have access to the most advanced soft- and hardware in the domain of noise and vibration and non-destructive structural dynamic research. You will pinpoint the origin of noise and vibration problems, do suggestions to solve them and stay with the engineering teams until the problems are solved.

Experience:
-Work experience as a noise and/or vibration engineer
-Experience in an international company is an asset
	
Knowledge/Educational requirement 
-Bachelor or Master degree in Mechanical Engineering or Physics.

职位名称: 研发工程师（即热式电热水器）
岗位职责:
Structure design of Instantaneous water heater, including 3D design and 2D drawing making.
System design of Instantaneous water heater, including solution definition, components spec definition, components chosen.
Closely and actively cooperate with related departments (Marketing/QC/PD/After service/Lab) in process of new development projects, or in daily supportive activities.
As in early age, small projects like product extension/modification will be assigned. Finally he/she will be in charge of new product development projects.
Other tasks related to R&D work.

Job description

1.) The development and maintenance of HPPC (High Pressure Piston Compressors)  products (standard products and custom products) which include but not limited to the HPPC compressors 
2.) Apply your expertise and knowledge in mechanical engineering towards design of new products and the localization of  existing designs with improved performance and optimized cost (preparation of technical drawings/specifications, compilation of technical reports, lab tests of prototypes).
3.) Design "first time right" by designing for assembly (cooperation with production), designing for manufacturing (cooperation with suppliers), designing for service (cooperation with Technical Support) and designing for superior performance.
3.) Evaluate cost and quality of the designs. This is followed continuous quality improvement of all current products, combined with cost reduction projects.
4.) Release Design Notifications to introduce designs for prototyping and production, this is done by publishing complete Bill Of material following Atlas Copso system.
5.) Safeguard correctness of designs and their specifications through CAD (3D and 2D) and part lists.
7.) Continuous and strong interaction with the other design centers in the Atlas Copco Group, use same and agreed design & development process and development tools.


Mission
Your mission as an employee of Atlas Copco Wuxi is divided into short-term objectives and long-term objectives. Such objectives are designed to empower Atlas Copco to develop and maintain markets for (High Pressure Piston Compressors) HPPC products, these products are mainly used in the handling of natural gas and or industrial gases. Markets are located primarily in China/Asia and also countries such as USA, Australia, North America.    

1.)the short-term objective scope extend within the boundaries of design and product maintenance of existing designs (standard products and custom products) and products used in high pressure compression equipment, the short-term is also designed for the improvement of existing design in such a way production efficiency is optimized and serviceability of such machines are made easy, the duration of this term is one complete year, During a successful completion of this term you should have sufficient experience to be heavily involved on project orientated tasks.   

2.)the long-term objective scope is defined under detailed projects, such details are defined by marketing hence it will contain technical, budget and time schedule targets that must be met. In such project your will participate in the design of compressors as well as foreseen the final product cost as well as the project budget and project time schedule. you will also foresee that new design are made to high standards such that the life cycle of the product is analyzed (design for safety, performance, assembly serviceability etc.). the nature of these projects include new designs dedicated for local and worldwide markets, localization of existing products (from other Atlas Copco product companies), and cost reduction projects.
任职资格:
Experience requirements
1.) At least 3 years experience with mechanical engineering preferably in high pressure equipment.
2.) Competence (proven experience) CAD system preferable Inventor and Auctocad

Educational requirements
Bachelor or master degree in mechanical Engineering, graduated in the field of equipment & compressors.
Personality requirements

1. You are a positive thinking; open minded team player with a strong interest to work in an international company. 
2. You are able to work independently and take initiative to learn. You are a good communicator and able to convince others to contribute to the realization of your projects. 
3. You see a challenge in every obstacle and have the ability to cope with pressure and setbacks.

岗位职责: 嵌入式系统软件等方面的软件开发及编程
任职资格:
软件组主要负责激光复合机打印机的底层嵌入式软件的开发，根据上层的控制要求、以及各种感应传感器的输入信号，实时控制各类马达等输出驱动部件，来实现复合机的整套机能的运作，包括激光复合机的核心现象转写机构，也包括给纸等各种前处理机构，和打孔装订等各种后处理机构，以及各机构之间的通信协作。

    开发过程中，需要和电气硬件开发人员一起商讨CPU引脚配置等电气回路的设计，也需要和机械设计人员一起商讨驱动结构等机械方面的设计；需要详细配置CPU的各项功能来实现整套嵌入式软件的运转，及使用示波器等外围设备的测试来验证自己的设计，也需要各模块的概要设计、详细设计、编程测试等良好的软件开发流程、编程习惯、代码规范和团队协作沟通能力。

    在整个软件开发流程当中，特别是在试作机正式组装可以运行之前，充分运用公司自行研制的复合机仿真环境，运行并验证自己的软件设计，修改并提高软件的设计品质；在试作机组装并可以运行之后，根据工作业务的需要，将仿真环境和实机环境结合，对自己的设计进行评价。根据工作业务情况，会有去日本总公司短期出差的需要，也会有去日本总公司长期研修的机会。

1. 计算机或自动控制相关专业本科以上学历
2. 熟练掌握C语言
3. 熟悉基于ARM / 瑞萨单片机系统的嵌入式软件开发
4. 有良好的模块设计、编程及测试习惯
5. 有电气回路及CPU相关知识
6. 有示波器等外围设备的使用经验
7. 有良好的学习能力、团队协作和沟通能力

3. Lead and coordinate multi-disciplinary teams (PLT’s). 
4. Coordinate and assist in the compilation of the overall program budget including development, manufacturing, testing, and capital costs in preparation of the RFA and Pro-Forma documents.
5. Prepare and present the program’s business plan to senior management in preparation for RFA submission.
6. Ensure the product is designed to meet Dana’s and the customer’s requirements and mass production manufacturability.
7. Responsible for the on-time and on-budget completion of all customer and Dana required deliverables for the program.
8. Assist and ensure the proper specification and procurement of capital equipment, tooling, gauging, and test equipment. 
9. Assist in the development and maintenance of quality documentation including; Process Flow diagrams, PFMEA’s, DFMEA’s, Control Plans, APQP checklists, and Work Instructions. 
10. Verify that the product measurement systems are properly developed and executed. 
11. May assist in various job duties of the Product, Manufacturing, and Quality Engineering disciplines to support the team members in completion of critical path tasks and/or workload sharing.  This shall not detract from the PM’s main responsibility of directing and coordinating the team.
12. Champion regular cross functional Product Launch Team (PLT) meetings to review the program schedule and assign resources to address any open issues.
13. Ensure that the adequate resources are assigned to all project tasks.  Elevate deficiencies to the appropriate management staff.
14. Ensure all team members follow the Purchasing Department (SCMG), APQP, and Process Series Review (PSR) policies and that adequate information is transferred to the vendors so they may in turn quote the scope of the job(s) properly and accurately.
15. Identify program risks and establish suitable contingency plans with the team.
16. Act as lead customer contact to ensure all their program related inquiries and requirements are addressed.
17. Keep track of all costs associated with program including material, processing costs, tooling, gauges, and customer owned tooling for cost recovery where applicable.
18. Participate in CARs, root cause analysis, 8D, Seven Step, and 5 Why’s as related to the program. 
19. Ensure all processes meet required production rates with the planned manpower and OEE targets.
20. Assure the timely completion of Engineering trials, production pilots, and PPAP runs with Manufacturing and Engineering.
21. Coordinate internal activities and customer approvals to obtain a successful PPAP submission.
22. Ensure the plant team’s participation in the development and understanding of the production process so they may successfully maintain the process after launch. 
23. Maintain effective communication with all disciplines.
任职资格:
Skills Required:

1. Excellent organizational and time management skills.
2. Strong project management skills and leadership abilities.
3. Assertive and self motivated.
4. Solid multi-disciplined background.
5. Ability to coordinate activities inter-company and with multiple departments such as Engineering, Operations, Accounting, Sales, etc.
6. Excellent communication (both written and oral) and interpersonal skills.
7. Excellent communication (both written and oral) in English and regional native language.
8. Good interpersonal skills.
9. Proficient in the use of MS Project, Excel, Word and PowerPoint.
10. Proficient in the understanding of Engineering drawings, GD&T, and technical specifications.

Experience & Educational Requirements:

The preference would be that the successful candidate has the following qualifications and experience:
1. Bachelor Degree/Diploma in Engineering, Business or technical field.
2. Minimum 3 years’ experience performing program coordination or program management within the automotive industry.
3. Varied multi-disciplined experience.
4. Experience as a customer contact.

职位名称: 高级射频应用设计工程师
岗位职责:
设计和测试无线射频系统，元器件，电路， 整机产品，收发器和功放
设计2.4G和1G以下无线射频系统，包括Zigbee, Z-Wave, Bluetooth （功放）
天线设计和优化
链路计算
优化链路和测试
设计基于基本无线模块的通用PCB电路板
熟悉ROHS, FCC, CE 等测试标准
协调及FCC, CE, ETSI标准测试
快速学习新的国际射频标准和应用开发工具
独立调整系统噪声和信号比率
与机械设计工程师和其他团队密切合作，确保最佳通信效果和外观设计

Responsibilities in general: 
Designs, develops, tests radio frequency (RF) systems architecture, components, circuits, or products. Includes antenna design, transmitters, amplifiers (chip based), and receivers. Details include: 
designing wireless RF modules for 2.4 and sub 1GHZ radios to include Zigbee, Z-Wave, Bluetooth (with and without amplifiers)
Focus on antenna design and optimization.
Calculate link budget
Device testing and evaluation including s-parameter, large signal load pull characterization as well as modulated signal measurements
designing general PCB's with sensor and control devices that make use of the wireless modules
Design considering ROHS, FCC, CE test
Lead the process of obtaining regulatory compliance (FCC, CE, ETSI)
Become an expert in international RF standards; design products to meet these requirements
Mitigate the effect of noise on RF performance
Collaborate with Mechanical Engineers on the packaging and placement of antennas within our products
任职资格:
五年以上电子工程和无线射频电路系统设计经验，具备天线设计经验优先
具有集成PCB板天线的经验
独立电路板设计经验
2，4，6层电路板设计
熟练使用信号发生器和矢量网络分析仪
全面的电子电路器件和系统知识
熟练使用PCB设计工具，例如Altium/Allegro或其他相似的软件
良好的沟通和团队协作能力
具备良好的问题解决技能和创造性思维分析能力

Requirements
5 or more years of industry experience in the field of electrical engineering and/or RF
Implemented at least 1 Wireless Antenna in a PCB
Design wireless boards from scratch
2,4,6 layer board experience
Experience using Vector Network Analyzer, Signal generators, etc
Thorough knowledge of electrical engineering fundamentals
Must be familiar with PCB design software, Altium/Allegro designer is a plus
Excellent Communication skills with all departments and disciplines.
Skillful at solving problems with enthusiasm and creativity

职位名称: 生产主管(山特维克合锐)
岗位职责:
The position would directly report to Production Manager, below please refer to the job description:  


Key performance areas: 
•To ensure the execution of production plans in full compliance with the forecast constraints (EHS, quality, output, delivery times, production efficiency, scrap rate etc.) and optimize the available resources.
•Assist production manager to formulate job objective, procedure and standard, execute company and group policy, law, regulation and so on. 
•Make sure operators compliance with the company policy and work discipline.  
•Recruit new workers and training them to make sure they are qualified to related job.
•Write and update production Work Instruction/SOP and make sure operators following work instructions & SOP in daily routine work.
•On site problem solving, include technical problem, non-conformity parts handling; resolve the issue which is exceptional in production;
•Strengthen EHS management in workshop, such as production safety,  labour protection, and environmental protection, support the training of workers; and daily check EHS status in workshop.
•Monitor consumable material stock and monthly usage, and purchase on time and monitoring the usage and try to reduce  consumption; 
•Continuous improve production efficiency and product quality, saving manufacturing costs, reducing production costs, implement 5S/Lean activities etc.
•Daily checking Movex reporting status, correct those which reported wrong.
•Make sure operator doing the daily maintenance of the equipment and improve equipment utilization; 
•Prepare weekly/monthly production report and do gap analyse base on KPI deviation.
任职资格:
Your profile: 
•Bachelor degree, university education or above, major in Engineering, Business or related specialty.
•More than 5 years’ work experience and at least 2 years practice as production supervisor level.
•5S&6-sigma experience in foreign invested manufacturing factory is a plus.
•Good at English of writing and speaking, be able to use English in daily communication
•Familiar with MS Office (Excel, Word, PPT) and Windows7 
•Team work and good communication competence
•Strong self-learning and ownership spirit 
•Drive result through people

As a person you are proactive, self-motivated and one with lot of initiative, courage and integrity and a business minded, result oriented attitude. You also have strong communication skills and can work in an English environment.

岗位职责:

3.生产现场及安全管理：建立现场管理制度，推进5S现场管理制度；负责落实各项生产安全制度，开展安全检查；
4.负责车间生产成本控制及车间员工管理；
5.完成领导交办的其他任务。

2.具有CNC /数控立式车床操机，调试的实践经验，熟悉深孔加工者优先；

4.服从工作安排而且有较强的工作责任心；
5.会操作Office办公软件，英语熟练。

职位名称: Advanced Manufacturing Advanced Manufacturing Engineer Prograrm Leader新产品转移工程师
岗位职责:
Role Summary/Purpose
The AME Program Leader is a critical, cross-functional leadership role that will help us elevate our performance with product quality, NPI readiness, & product life cycle management. This role serves as a primary interface between the supply chain & other key stakeholders and leads cross-functional processes & Op Mechs to drive improvements in product performance.

Essential Responsibilities
• Product Quality: Responsible for improving product quality performance by driving cross-functional initiatives with released products and within NPI cycles
• New Product Introductions (NPI): Responsible for creating and delivering on the MFG Strategy for NPI programs, including the manufacturing plan and manufacturing deliverables. Responsible for program management of manufacturing NPI deliverables required to establish optimal supply chains & production processes for each product launch, and to ensure launch readiness and launch quality. 
• New Product Introductions: Leadership in driving key Operations requirements into each product launch, including Quality initiatives, Lean initiatives, Simplification initiatives, and Design for Manufacture/Assembly (DFM/DFA) initiatives.
• Product life cycle management: Responsible for driving cross-functional activities to product vitality and minimize component obsolescence issues and to manage product End of Life initiatives.
• Primary linkages are to the Design and Install Base Engineering teams, the Product Marketing teams, and the Quality and Service teams that have responsibility for your products and to all facets of the Operations teams that execute supply chain, make and test processes for your products.
• Ability to work in a global environment, across cultures, geographies, and time zones.
任职资格:
Qualifications/Requirements
1. B.S. Degree in Mechanical, Electrical, Industrial Engineering or related technical degree and 3 years’ experience or Associates Degree and 5 years’ experience or High School diploma with 7 years of experience in production, engineering or troubleshooting
2. Demonstrated troubleshooting, analytical and planning skills
3. Ability to work independently
4. Demonstrated strong communication skills (written and verbal) to all levels of the organization
5. Ability to identify and implement Best Practices
6. Ability to influence in a matrix organization, across multiple functions, business units and locations.
7. Strong analytical skills with the ability to identify, interpret, and resolve unstructured problems.
8. Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to communicate complex technical issues in an easy to understand manner to all levels of the organization. 
9. Strong project management skills with demonstrated ability to drive results on time.
10. Ability to manage tactical execution as well as lead with strategic mindset. 
11. Team player with strong facilitation/interpersonal skills and a demonstrated commitment to process improvement. 
12. Energized, passionate, change agent with personal commitment to deliver quality projects. 
13. Clear Thinker who is able to translate thought into action and execution. 
14. Excellent multi-tasking abilities
15. Fluent in the English language.

Desired Characteristics
1. MS/PHD in technical concentration/field
2. Previous experience in sourcing, shop floor leadership, manufacturing engineering, design engineering and/or process engineering.
3. 6-sigma DMAIC & DFSS certified 
4. Experiences in Process Intensive manufacturing
5. Product and Process Development experience 
6. Working knowledge of product life cycle methods (i.e. specification, design, implementation, verification & validation) and associated documentation
7. Solid working knowledge of GEHC QMS procedures for GMP 
8. Experienced developing tools and templates
9. Previous experience in sourcing, shop floor leadership, manufacturing engineering, design engineering and/or process engineering
10. Minimum 3 years work experience in a highly regulated environment such as medical or aviation equipment manufacture. 
11. Strong process orientation, project management certification a plus. 
12. Advanced Degree – Masters of Business Administration or Masters of Engineering.

Design, organize, optimize and control all supply chain activities of company.

Focus on Industry 4.0 in automation and digitization.
