职位名称: 应收账款会计 AR accountant
岗位职责:
Responsibilities:
Be responsible for carrying out the activities of billing and credit collection.  Be responsible for adherence to KPM’s for China including DSO, A/R Ledger percent current and bad debt as a percentage of sales.  Has responsibility for all day to day accounts receivable functions in the China marketplace in accordance with the Global Credit Guidelines.  Maintain working relationships with our sales team and customers throughout China.

Performs A/R Credit and Collection activities in the China theatre:
- Ensures adherence to corporate credit policy and approved credit limits for customers to minimize bad debt losses and maximize profitable sales.
- Ensures monthly collection targets are met regularly.
- Interact effectively with sales force and customers.
- Work Closely with Accounting related to China Receivable matters.
- Work closely with Customer Service on disputed customer return issues.
- Work closely with Local Sales and EMEA/Asiapac AR department to support financial and management reporting needs, process improvements, and customer research and risk assessments.
- Related duties may include but not be limited to participation in sales / credit conferences, conducting needs assessments, and collaborating on strategic customer inquiries and research.
- Answers customer credit reference inquires.
- Ensure accurate and up to date customer credit check groupings.
- Actively review credit holds and either release orders or work with customers/sales to release orders at such time as the account warrants releasing.
- Ensure daily receipts are correctly posted in oracle
- Ensure daily invoice procedures are completed in accordance with government requirements.

Advise Collection Strategy for Problem or Bad Debt Accounts:
- Develop and advise credit strategies for bankruptcies, bad debt or preference claim situations consulting with the EMEA/ASIAPAC credit manager when necessary.
- Includes the management of accounts placed for collection, the filing of customer bankruptcy documents and the research for any preference claim investigations.
- Recommend bad debt write offs and work with accounting to establish adequate bad debt reserves.

Participate in Monthly A/R Reviews with EMEA/ASIAPAC Credit Manager and Provide Recommendations.
- Including requesting credit lines, temporary increases in credit lines and special terms of sale.
- Review credit approval and collection guidelines and recommend improvements.
- Develops implements and maintains systems, procedures and policies.

Miscellaneous Other
- Cash/Banking and Treasury support for China and AsiaPac
- Emerging Markets Credit support
- Is able to work with limited supervision
- Strong written and verbal communication skills
- Leverage utilization of Oracle and other systems to optimize AR & Credit effectiveness
任职资格:
Requirements:
- Minimum 2-4 years of experience in similar global company environment
- Ability to speak, interpret, and write in both English and Mandarin Collections.
- Significant experience contacting customers to collect past due balances. Resolves the most complex discrepancies and invoices. Assists others in the department on complex collection matters.
- Bankruptcy Laws. Understanding of laws and regulations as they evolve in key government agencies and legislatures.
- Accounts Receivable (A/R). Significant experience in an enterprise-wide accounts receivable function in similar international company. Can discuss A/R considerations for multi-national or global customers.
- Recent Oracle or other similar ERP experience essential.

岗位职责:
Job Summary:
The Cost Accountant is responsible for the full spectrum of cost accounting functions including cost maintenance, variance and expense review, inventory controls and cost/price analysis, updating Intercompany transfer prices, KPM reports and monthly close entries.

Primary Responsibilities:
	Standard Costing
o	Planning, Studying, and collecting data to determine costs of business activity such as raw material purchases, inventory and labor.
o	Establish Standard Cost
o	Update overhead rates annually
o	Prepare cost analysis
o	Maintaining Cost Accounting/Inventory System
o	Standardize and streamline standard costing processes
o	Compute standard costs needed for nonstandard parts

        Intercompany Transfer Pricing
o	Update Intercompany transfer prices as needed
o	Check ITP for oversee shipments
o	ITP analysis

	Analysis
o	Analyze manufacturing variance
o	Providing management with reports specifying and comparing factors affecting prices and profitability of products or services.
o	Prepare and analyze monthly KPM reports that are related to production processes
o	Analyzing Work Order variance
o	Analyzing labor hours
o	Analyzing BVA
o	Analyzing actual manufacturing costs and preparing periodic reports comparing standard costs to actual production costs
o	Reconciles finished goods inventories
o	Analyzing changes in product design, raw materials, manufacturing methods or services provided, to determine effects on cost.
o	Providing management with reports specifying and comparing factors affecting prices and profitability of products or services.
o	Conducts physical inventories and monitors cycle count program
o	Work with Corporate on various analysis

	Monthly Close
o	Perform month end close
o	Review all month end reports
o	Perform some month end processes for other Panduit entities

	Special Projects
o	As assigned.
任职资格:
Requirements:
	Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting or Finance required.
	Pursuit of CPA is encouraged.
	3+ years of previous experience.
	Good command of English, both orally and in writing. CET-4 or higher.

岗位职责:
Purpose and Targeting职位目的及目标 
1. Prepare and Control the production plan in order to准备和控制生产计划，为了
&#8226	Acheive the target for the OTD to the customer达成准时交货率指标 
•	Acheive the target for the inventory level达成库存水平目标
•	Acheive an efficient and balanced capacity utilisation达成产能的高效化和均衡化
 2. Support for the lean production implementation支持精益生产的实施
 
Description of the job activities工作内容描述 
part one: Plan for Prodcution
第一部分：生产计划

1.	Set up the monthly master production schedule (MPS) for the whole production system 
为整个生产建立主生产计划
2.	As part of the PMC team you will be responsible to partly prepare the weekly planning to ensure that the production schedule is reasonable and achievable. This also includes the planning for the delivery to the external manufacturer.
作为PMC团队的一员，负责部分周计划以确保生产安排的合理和可实现。同时也包括外包的发货计划。
3.	 Quickly respond to market changes and reschedule the production plan.
根据市场变化迅速反馈并调整生产计划。
4.	Control the execution of the production plan for all the product lines and follow up the production on time delivery (OTD)
控制所有生产线的生产计划的执行，跟踪产品的的及时交付
5.	Responsibility to achieve the target for the inventory level which has to be set up in collaboration with the production, logistics and sales department 
负责与生产，物流和销售部门的合作以达成库存水平指标
6.	Control the interface to the internal logistics team as it will be an important source of information concerning the actual status of the production and in order to support a smooth material flow
跟内部物流团队接口，以便了解生产的实际情况，支持物料的平稳流转
7.	Work with production, sales, quality, logistic and engineering department to solve any delivery related issues
跟生产，销售，质量，物流和工程部门一起配合解决任何有关发货的问题。
8.	Responsible for weekly and monthly WIP stocktaking and check the deviation of the monthly yield report.
负责每周和每月的在制品盘点，检查月度产量的偏差。
9.	Responsibility to issue the plan for middle ring and forging die to match the production demand
负责制定中间环和锻压模具的计划以满足生产需要
10.	Support project task such as the implementation of a lean production planning and control method.
支持项目工作，例如精益生产计划和控制方法的执行。

Part two： Plan for Material (possible job enlargement for the future)
第二部分：物料计划（未来可能的工作扩大化）

1.	Responsible for the planning of direct materials according to production plan.
根据生产计划负责直接材料计划。
2.	Follow up the material delivery from the vendor and ensure continuous supply in order to meet production schedule.
跟踪供应商的物料配送以确保连续供货已满足生产需求。
3.	Responsible for inventory management to meet the target inventory level.
负责库存管理已满足库存水平指标
4.	Coordinate and support the continuous improvement concerning on time delivery and quality problems of pre-material.
协调和支持关于按时交货和前道材料质量问题方面的持续改进
5.	Responsible to maintain BOM & material code to ensure data accuracy.

4. Effective listener and communicator.
5. Proficient technical skills Microsoft Office; Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, Lotus Notes.
6. Excellent organizational and follow up skills.

10. Able to effectively interface with other disciplines in the organization to achieve results.

职位分类: 化工实验室研究员/技术员

岗位职责: 负责硅材料、太阳能组件等相关产品的研发工作。
任职资格: 研究生学历，材料学专业（硅材料、金属材料、有机/无机材料、化学材料等），有一定的理论基础（应届生或毕业2年内圴可）。

岗位职责:
a. 熟练使用C/C++/C#中任一语言，熟练使用上述语言中的至少一种IDE；
    b. 熟练使用T-SQL操作数据库；
    c. 能利用已有API进行软件二次开发；
    d. 能按照设计要求完成单元模块测试和软件总体测试。
任职资格:
a. 电子或计算机等相关专业，硕士以上学历；
    b. 两年以上相关领域的研发经验和算法设计经验；
    c. 扎实的数据信号处理基础，深入理解数字信号处理方面的基本理论和方法；
    d. 深入研究过各种算法，熟练掌握c语言程序设计和主流DSP开发语言； 
    e. 有良好的英语阅读和书面表达能力；
    f. 工作认真负责，严谨细致，良好的沟通能力及团队协作能力。

岗位职责:
Purpose of the Job:
Within the respective area of expertise, translate the business requirements of MES (Manufacturing Execution System) into IT solutions which provide sustainable value to the business and are in line with agreed MES projects and constraints.  Coordinates the successful roll-out of IT solution changes into the live environment.

Your Role
You are a subject matter expert in your area of expertise. The main activities are:
- You interact and work in close collaboration with MES project managers, Enterprise Architects (EA), and Business analysts
- You manage third party providers, challenges and analyzes solution proposals made by subcontractor
- You translate business requirements into IT requirements and create solution proposals in cooperation with outsourcing partners
- You enable first time right (working) delivery of solutions coordinating design, develop, build, test and maintenance of applications and IT solutions that provide sustainable value to the business in line with business and IT requirements and aligned architecture
- You deliver committed portfolio of projects, pilots, prototypes within agreed constraints (time, budget and scope)
- You ensure that  the solutions have been developed to meet Operational and Service Level Requirements
- You assist Operations and Services as third line in advanced troubleshooting
- You provide knowledge transfer within your team and training of Operations and Services
- You plan and oversee the successful roll-out of IT solution changes into the live environment

Context Description & Dimensions
- You interact and work in close collaboration with MES Project managers, Enterprise Architects (EA), MES Plants and Business analysts 
- Working location: Jiangyin, close to Bekaert MES plants
- Travel frequency: 30 - 40% (to other China MES plants outside Jiangyin and Europe)
任职资格:
Your Profile
- You have a IT/engineering/manufacturing related master degree
- You have at least 3 years of MES or manufacturing working experience
- You have strong analytical skills and the ability to work autonomous
- You have a strong IT technical knowledge
- You are eager to deepen your expertise and you are an innovative thinker
- You like to work together with others, you get energy by getting things done together with others and you have strong interpersonal and communication skills
- You have strong coordination skills
- You speak fluently English

该职位工作地点在江阴市。公司提供每日往返无锡的班车，共4条路线

职位分类: 化工实验室研究员/技术员
岗位职责:
职责一：收集行业市场的产品标准、测试技术和测试标准，提出产品改进建议。
工作内容：
1、	跟踪行业市场的产品性能标准、测试标准、测试技术的变化，并收集相关信息，为课内参与决策提供信息支持。
2、	协助课内技术开发工作，并提出测试室仪器等合理规划。
3、	提出产品改进建议和新产品开发提议
职责二：参与实验室的规划、建设、运行与维护，为公司产品提供测试服务。
工作内容：
1、参与规划、建设、运行和维护实验室。
2、参与制定产品测试相关的标准和制度。
3、为公司产品提供测试服务，配合产品开发任务或产品论证工作的完成
职责三：参与产品销售的技术支持
1、	参与提供公司项目合同签订前的技术支持工作
2、	参与解决合同履行过程中和售后维修中的技术问题
3、	向供应商提供产品技术描述和其他技术资料，并参与编写培训教材和用户培训工作
职责四：技术文档编写和专利申请中的技术文件提供。
工作内容：
1、对原有产品和新开发产品建立完整的产品设计技术文档。
2、提出技术专利申请建议，提供相应技术文件。
任职资格:
1、硕士以上学历，有机化学相关专业；
2、英语或日语熟练，3年以上工作经验，优秀者无工作经验亦可；
3、熟悉使用各类办公软件，能独立进行文档制作；
4、善于分析，缜密细致，追求细节，逻辑性强；
5、有一定的合成能力，熟练使用各种实验仪器、设备。具有较强的专业技术能力、判断与决策能力、沟通能力、计划与执行能力，并具备一定的写作能力。

岗位职责:
